original: de smras pa /
analyzed: de smras pa /
translated: He says:

original: gal te ldan pa khang pa na //
analyzed: gal te ldan pa khang pa na //
translated: If the house is the possessor,

original: de yi phreng ba de ci yin ;
analyzed: de yi phreng ba de ci yin ;
translated: what is the garland?

original: / rigs yin na khang pa gcig kyang //
analyzed: / rigs yin na khang pa gcig kyang //
translated: If the house is the species, then even a single house

original: phreng ba zhes brjod shing bzhin du'o //
analyzed: phreng ba zhes brjod shing bzhin du'o //
translated: is called a garland, like a string.

original: rigs la rigs ni med pa'i phyir //üîΩphreng ba la de'i sgras cing 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs la rigs ni med pa'i phyir // phreng ba la de'i sgras cing 'gyur //
translated: Since a species does not have a species,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: how could the word be applied to the garland?

original: khang pa ni ldan pa gcig dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khang pa ni ldan pa gcig dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: A house is not a possessor because it is not a single possessor,

original: lcags dang shing dang so phag la sogs pa'i ldan pa mang ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: lcags dang shing dang so phag la sogs pa'i ldan pa mang ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: because there are many possessors such as iron, wood, and bricks.

original: / yang na gal te khang pa ldan pa gcig par khas len na /
analyzed: / yang na gal te khang pa ldan pa gcig par khas len na /
translated: Moreover, if you accept that a house is a single possessor,

original: khang pa de rnams kyi phreng ba ci zhig tu 'gyur /üîΩrdzas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khang pa de rnams kyi phreng ba ci zhig tu 'gyur / rdzas ni ma yin te /
translated: what is the garland of those houses?

original: de'i yon tan khang pa la ni 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyon tan ma yin zhing las kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i yon tan khang pa la ni 'jug pa'i phyir ro // yon tan ma yin zhing las kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not a substance because the quality of that is engaged in the house.

original: de dag rdzas la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir dang / khang pa ni rdzas @66a * //üîΩma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag rdzas la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir dang / khang pa ni rdzas @66a * //üîΩma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a quality or an action because those are the direct cause of the substance and the house is not a substance.

original: 'on te khang bzangs kyi phreng ba rigs su khas len te /
analyzed: 'on te khang bzangs kyi phreng ba rigs su khas len te /
translated: Or do you accept that a row is a collection of houses?

original: 'di ltar rigs ni dngos po gsum la 'jug pa can du 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs ni dngos po gsum la 'jug pa can du 'dod do zhe na /
translated: In that case, a row would be asserted to be a collection of three things.

original: 'o na ni khang pa gcig la yang phreng ba zhes brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni khang pa gcig la yang phreng ba zhes brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: But then a single house would also be called a row,

original: dper na shing gcig la shing gi sgrar brjod par bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na shing gcig la shing gi sgrar brjod par bya ba bzhin no //
translated: just as a single tree is called a forest.üîΩMoreover, the word ‚Äúrow‚Äù would be used for many rows of houses, etc.,

original: gzhan yang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba rnams mang po la phreng ba de'i sgra phreng ba 'di dag go zhes bya ba 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba rnams mang po la phreng ba de'i sgra phreng ba 'di dag go zhes bya ba 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: as in ‚Äúthese are the rows.‚Äù

original: 'on te phreng ba la yang rigs la brten nas phreng ba'i sgra 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te phreng ba la yang rigs la brten nas phreng ba'i sgra 'jug go zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the word ‚Äúrow‚Äù is used in dependence on a collection,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rigs la rigs med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rigs la rigs med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because a collection does not have a collection.

original: phreng pa'i rigs la rigs gzhan khas len par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phreng pa'i rigs la rigs gzhan khas len par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to accept that a collection of a collection of a row is a different collection.

original: khas len na yang phreng ba'i rigs kyi rigs la yang rigs kyi tha snyad yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khas len na yang phreng ba'i rigs kyi rigs la yang rigs kyi tha snyad yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: And if you do accept that, then the collection of the collection of a row would also have the term ‚Äúcollection.‚Äù

original: de la yang rigs gzhan yod pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang rigs gzhan yod pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And since there are other types of that, there would be an infinite regress.

original: gal te yang rigs phreng ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang rigs phreng ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that a string is a series of types,

original: de lta na ni phreng ba chen po'i zhes bya bar ji ltar phreng ba la sogs pa chen por bstan pa shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni phreng ba chen po'i zhes bya bar ji ltar phreng ba la sogs pa chen por bstan pa shes par 'gyur te /
translated: then how could it be known that a great string and so on are taught,

original: chen po ni rdzas la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po ni rdzas la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because greatness is the aggregation of substances?

original: 'on te rdzas dang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i chen po rdzas nyid la brten pas nye bar btags nas phreng bar sgro 'dogs pas de nyid kyi phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rdzas dang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i chen po rdzas nyid la brten pas nye bar btags nas phreng bar sgro 'dogs pas de nyid kyi phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that a great aggregation of substances is imputed to a string because it is based on substances, then there is no error because it is imputed to a string.

original: 'dir smras pa ;
analyzed: 'dir smras pa ;
translated: Here we say:

original: phreng sogs chen po nyid sogs gang //
analyzed: phreng sogs chen po nyid sogs gang //
translated: What is the greatness of a string and so on?

original: nye bar btags las 'dod na yang //
analyzed: nye bar btags las 'dod na yang //
translated: If you assert that it is imputed,

original: dngos kyi khyad par med shes pas //üîΩgzung bya nyid phyir nyer btags min //
analyzed: dngos kyi khyad par med shes pas // gzung bya nyid phyir nyer btags min //
translated: then since it is known that a string and so on are great,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is not imputed because it is apprehended.

original: phreng ba chen po dang ring po zhes pa phreng ba'i tha snyad gang zhig nags chen po zhes nags la chen po nyid la sogs par 'dod pa nye bar btags pas byas pa ste /
analyzed: phreng ba chen po dang ring po zhes pa phreng ba'i tha snyad gang zhig nags chen po zhes nags la chen po nyid la sogs par 'dod pa nye bar btags pas byas pa ste /
translated: The terms ‚Äúgreat‚Äù and ‚Äúlong‚Äù are designations made by the convention of a rosary, just as ‚Äúgreat forest‚Äù is a designation made by the convention of a forest.

original: de ni nye bar btags par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar btags par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not logical to designate them as great or long.

original: phreng ba rnams la ring po nyid du nye bar btags pas shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phreng ba rnams la ring po nyid du nye bar btags pas shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not known by the designation of long in the rosaries.

original: nye bar btags pas mi shes par gyur pa nye bar gdags par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pas mi shes par gyur pa nye bar gdags par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not known by designation cannot be designated.

original: brjod pa ni shes pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: brjod pa ni shes pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because speech is the cause of knowledge.

original: /'on te phreng ba rnams la chen po med pas nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: /'on te phreng ba rnams la chen po med pas nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that they are designated as great because they are not great,üîΩthen since they are designated in all things,

original: 'o na ni dngos po thams cad la btags par gyur na chen po yod pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na ni dngos po thams cad la btags par gyur na chen po yod pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to refute the existence of greatness,

original: dngos po thams cad la nye bar btags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la nye bar btags par 'gyur ro //
translated: they would be designated in all things.

original: 'on te dngos kyi rtogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te dngos kyi rtogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: But if you say that they are designated because they are free from the realization of things,üîΩthen they would not be designated in all things.

original: phreng ba la nye bar btags nas @66b ring po nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phreng ba la nye bar btags nas @66b ring po nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that length is imputed to a garland,

original: de ni ma yin te dngos kyi chen po la phreng ba chen po shes pa gang yin pa de las khyad par med pa'i shes pa'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te dngos kyi chen po la phreng ba chen po shes pa gang yin pa de las khyad par med pa'i shes pa'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then that is not so, because the cognition of a great garland is not different from the cognition of a great thing.

original: de la 'khrul par rtogs pa skye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'khrul par rtogs pa skye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no arising of a cognition that conceives of it as mistaken.

original: 'on te tha dad pa'i chen po'i rgyu mtshan med par yang phreng ba chen po'i sgra 'jug pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa'i chen po'i rgyu mtshan med par yang phreng ba chen po'i sgra 'jug pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the term ‚Äúgreat garland‚Äù is imputed because the term ‚Äúgreat‚Äù is used without a different reason,üîΩwe say:

original: smras pa / rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid de //
analyzed: smras pa / rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid de //
translated: It is unreasonable to have a reason that does not exist,

original: dngos su 'dod pa la yang mtshungs //
analyzed: dngos su 'dod pa la yang mtshungs //
translated: because it is the same in the case of the assertion of an actual reason.

original: drug po rnams la tshig don sgra //
analyzed: drug po rnams la tshig don sgra //
translated: The term ‚Äúgreat‚Äù is applied to the six,

original: rgyu mtshan gang la ltos par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gang la ltos par 'gyur //
translated: but in dependence on what reason?

original: zhes bya ba la /üîΩtha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos yin la /
translated: Here,

original: tha mi dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni btags pa'o zhes smra ba gang yin pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni btags pa'o zhes smra ba gang yin pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: if you say that a different reason is actual and a nondifferent reason is imputed, that is unreasonable.

original: gang gis gang dag la dngos kyi don yod pa de dag dngos su mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis gang dag la dngos kyi don yod pa de dag dngos su mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Whatever things have a real referent are directly asserted to have a real referent.

original: yan lag can zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa de dag la yang rgyu mtshan med pa'o zhes bstan ma thag pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa de dag la yang rgyu mtshan med pa'o zhes bstan ma thag pa yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúwhole‚Äù is also without a reason, as has just been explained.

original: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid ni dngos kyi sgra rnams la yang mtshungs pa'o//
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid ni dngos kyi sgra rnams la yang mtshungs pa'o//
translated: Therefore, being without a reason is the same for terms that refer to real things.

original: gzhan yang drug la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tshig gi don gyi sgra ni ci'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang drug la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tshig gi don gyi sgra ni ci'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, why would a term that refers to a meaning that engages six things

original: rgyu mtshan spyi yod pa la ltos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan spyi yod pa la ltos par 'gyur te /
translated: depend on the existence of a general reason?

original: rigs dang khyad par dang 'du ba rnams la rigs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs dang khyad par dang 'du ba rnams la rigs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no reason for a class, a distinction, and a collection.

original: 'on te tshig gi don gyi sgra rang gi ngo bos 'jug pa rgyur byas nas dngos po rnams la 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tshig gi don gyi sgra rang gi ngo bos 'jug pa rgyur byas nas dngos po rnams la 'jug go zhe na /
translated: But if a term that refers to a meaning engages things on the basis of engaging its own nature as a cause,

original: de lta na ni brjod pa thams cad rang gi ngo bo brjod nas don gyi rjod par byed par ston par 'gyur na rigs la sogs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de lta na ni brjod pa thams cad rang gi ngo bo brjod nas don gyi rjod par byed par ston par 'gyur na rigs la sogs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If that were so, then it would be teaching that all expressions express their own nature and then express the meaning, so what would be the use of the words class and so on?

original: de'i phyir sgra rgyu mtshan med pa can du bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rgyu mtshan med pa can du bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore it would be teaching that sound is without a reason.

original: 'on te tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ma gtogs pa nyid du tshig gi don drug gi sgra tshig gi don drug tshig gi rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir de la dngos yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ma gtogs pa nyid du tshig gi don drug gi sgra tshig gi don drug tshig gi rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir de la dngos yin par 'gyur la /
translated: But if the words of the six categories are the expressive words of the six categories, then they would be the actual words.

original: chen po la sogs pa'i sgra gang yin pa de ni yon tan gyi rgyu mtshan yin pas /
analyzed: chen po la sogs pa'i sgra gang yin pa de ni yon tan gyi rgyu mtshan yin pas /
translated: The words great and so on are the reason for the quality,

original: rgyu yon tan med par 'jug par gyur pa ni btags par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu yon tan med par 'jug par gyur pa ni btags par 'gyur te /
translated: so it would be imputed to engage without the quality as its cause.

original: gang la bden pa'i don can der dngos yin no zhe na /üîΩde ni mi bden te /
analyzed: gang la bden pa'i don can der dngos yin no zhe na / de ni mi bden te /
translated: If it has a true meaning, then it is the actual word.üîΩThat is not true because

original: gang gi phyir //üîΩgang zhig ji ltar grags pa las //
analyzed: gang gi phyir // gang zhig ji ltar grags pa las //
translated: it is said:üîΩBecause it is established

original: grub pa de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: grub pa de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir //
translated: in accordance with how it is renowned,

original: gang la de skad brjod dngos btags //
analyzed: gang la de skad brjod dngos btags //
translated: what is called the actual wordüîΩis imputed.

original: yod pa la yang med 'dogs phyir //
analyzed: yod pa la yang med 'dogs phyir //
translated: Because nonexistence is imputed to what exists.üîΩ

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because non-existence is imputed to what exists.

original: grags pa'i dbang gis tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang /üîΩji ltar rang bzhin gang chen po nyid la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya @67a * //
analyzed: grags pa'i dbang gis tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang / ji ltar rang bzhin gang chen po nyid la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya @67a * //
translated: In this regard, although there is no reason for difference by the power of fame,üîΩjust as a forest, etc., which is the referent of the words ‚Äúgreatness,‚Äù etc.,

original: ba'i nags la sogs pa gang zhig grub pa de ni chen po de nyid dang ldan pa dngos yin gyi /
analyzed: ba'i nags la sogs pa gang zhig grub pa de ni chen po de nyid dang ldan pa dngos yin gyi /
translated: is established, that is the actual thing that possesses that greatness,

original: de la nye bar btags pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la nye bar btags pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not just imputed to it.

original: skyes bu la sogs pa la seng ge dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: skyes bu la sogs pa la seng ge dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: It is like a lion in relation to a person, etc.üîΩSince there exists something similar to the famous lion‚Äôs qualities of courage, etc.,

original: grags pa can gyi seng ge'i yon tan rtul phod pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba yod pa las de bzhin du seng ge'i sgras brjod pa de ni de la btags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: grags pa can gyi seng ge'i yon tan rtul phod pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba yod pa las de bzhin du seng ge'i sgras brjod pa de ni de la btags pa yin gyi /
translated: the expression ‚Äúlion‚Äù in that context is a metaphor.

original: med pa'i don can btags pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i don can btags pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a metaphor whose meaning is non-existent,

original: yod pa la yang med par btags pa 'jug pa'i phyir dper na bu yin yang bu'i bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yod pa la yang med par btags pa 'jug pa'i phyir dper na bu yin yang bu'i bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: because non-existence is imputed to what exists. For example, although something is a son, it is not engaged in the activity of a son.

original: bu med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa phal par 'gyur ba dang / med pa yang med pa'i sgras dngos kho nar brjod pa ste /
analyzed: bu med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa phal par 'gyur ba dang / med pa yang med pa'i sgras dngos kho nar brjod pa ste /
translated: and the expression ‚Äúthere is no son‚Äù would be a mere convention, and the word ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù would refer only to an entity.

original: gal te yang dngos po'i yul can dngos kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pa de lta na ni dngos po'i yul can nub na med pa la dngos kyi tha snyad 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yang dngos po'i yul can dngos kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pa de lta na ni dngos po'i yul can nub na med pa la dngos kyi tha snyad 'dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object of a convention is an entity, and if the cause of the convention of an entity is an entity, then when the object of the convention of an entity has disappeared, the convention of an entity would not be applied to a nonentity.

original: gang yang tha dad pa'i rgyu med kyang tshig gi don gyi sgra dngos po la 'jug pa de der dngos yin no zhes brjod pa de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang yang tha dad pa'i rgyu med kyang tshig gi don gyi sgra dngos po la 'jug pa de der dngos yin no zhes brjod pa de yang mi rigs te /
translated: And it is not correct to say that the word that is the referent of a word applies to an entity even though there is no separate cause,

original: de lta na ni tha dad pas byas pa dngos ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni tha dad pas byas pa dngos ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: because in that case, it would not be an entity that is produced by a separate cause,

original: tha dad pa'i rgyu med kyang tshig gi don gyi sgra dngos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rgyu med kyang tshig gi don gyi sgra dngos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word that is the referent of a word is an entity even though there is no separate cause.

original: gang med na yang 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu mtshan no zhes tha snyad 'dogs par grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang med na yang 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu mtshan no zhes tha snyad 'dogs par grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it would not be established that that which occurs even when something does not exist is the reason for the convention of that.

original: tshig gi don gyi sgra la tha snyad pa'i rgyu las 'das kyang dngos por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig gi don gyi sgra la tha snyad pa'i rgyu las 'das kyang dngos por 'gyur ro //
translated: The sound of the meaning of the word is beyond the cause of convention, but it becomes a thing.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not characterized by a separate cause.

original: 'o na gal te grags pas bstan pa dngos yin na ni grags pa de nyid rigs med par ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na gal te grags pas bstan pa dngos yin na ni grags pa de nyid rigs med par ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Now, if what is known is taught as a thing, then how can that which is known be without a cause?

original: grags pa rgyu med pa can du nges par gnas pa can du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: grags pa rgyu med pa can du nges par gnas pa can du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is not reasonable for what is known to definitely exist without a cause.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: grags pa brda yi rjes 'gro ba //
analyzed: grags pa brda yi rjes 'gro ba //
translated: What is known follows convention.

original: de yang brjod 'dod rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: de yang brjod 'dod rjes 'gro can //
translated: And that also follows the desire to express.

original: tha snyad don du byas pa yin //
analyzed: tha snyad don du byas pa yin //
translated: It is made for the sake of convention.

original: sdeb sbyor sgra yi cha'i ming bzhin //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor sgra yi cha'i ming bzhin //
translated: Like the name of a part of a sound in prosody.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here it is said:

original: grags pa rgyu med pa can ma yin zhing /
analyzed: grags pa rgyu med pa can ma yin zhing /
translated: What is known is not without a cause.

original: rigs la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not characterized by a cause such as a class.

original: 'on kyang gang la brda nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu yod pa de ni brda'i rjes su byed pa can 'di yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang la brda nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu yod pa de ni brda'i rjes su byed pa can 'di yin no //
translated: However, that which has a cause that follows convention itself is this follower of convention.

original: 'o na brda de yang ji ltar phyir rol gyi rgyu med par skye zhe na de ni ma yin te /üîΩgang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'o na brda de yang ji ltar phyir rol gyi rgyu med par skye zhe na de ni ma yin te / gang gi phyir /
translated: That is not so.

original: brda de yang brjod par 'dod pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
analyzed: brda de yang brjod par 'dod pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
translated: Because that convention is the reason for the desire to express.

original: tshig 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ni le'u dang por bstan to //
analyzed: tshig 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ni le'u dang por bstan to //
translated: The fact that it is dependent on the desire for words was taught in the first chapter.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir brda byed ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir brda byed ce na /
translated: But why create the convention?

original: phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshan @67b med par yang tha snyad kyi don du brda byed pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshan @67b med par yang tha snyad kyi don du brda byed pa yin te /
translated: The convention is created for the purpose of communication even without an external reason.

original: sdeb sbyor gyi ming dang / sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin no //üîΩ'di ltar ltar sde ba sbyor ni rkang chag dang / rkyang pa dang tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'i ming dang / chig gi yang yan lag rnams ngo bo nyid dang rkyen la sogs pa'i ming byed pa la phyi rol pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sdeb sbyor gyi ming dang / sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin no // 'di ltar ltar sde ba sbyor ni rkang chag dang / rkyang pa dang tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'i ming dang / chig gi yang yan lag rnams ngo bo nyid dang rkyen la sogs pa'i ming byed pa la phyi rol pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is like the name of a meter and the name of a part of a word.üîΩThus, the name of a meter such as ‚Äújagatƒ´‚Äù and the name of a part of a word such as ‚Äúsu‚Äù are created for the sake of the meter and the part of the word.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ngo bo nyid dang rkyen gyi char btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ngo bo nyid dang rkyen gyi char btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They do not have the slightest external cause, because they are imputed as the parts of the nature and condition as one wishes.

original: de bas na /üîΩdngos po khams bzangs phreng sogs kyi //
analyzed: de bas na / dngos po khams bzangs phreng sogs kyi //
translated: Therefore,üîΩThe sounds of things, good elements, garlands, and so on,

original: sgra rnams kyang gzhan la ltos min //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyang gzhan la ltos min //
translated: Do not depend on others.

original: zhes bya bar gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bar gnas pa yin no //
translated: This is the position.

original: de'i phyir mtshungs par brjod pa mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshungs par brjod pa mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because of seeing the expression of similarity,

original: rigs rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The inference of a universal is not possible.

original: 'o na ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i lugs kyis kyang blo dang sgra dag rjes su 'gro bar snang ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i lugs kyis kyang blo dang sgra dag rjes su 'gro bar snang ba yin zhe na /
translated: Well, how is it that the Buddhist system also has the appearance of the concomitance of cognition and words?

original: blo dang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba phyi rol pas byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blo dang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba phyi rol pas byas pa ma yin te /
translated: The concomitance of cognition and words is not produced by an external object.

original: 'on kyang bag chags kyi sa bon sad pa thob pas phul du byung ba can gyi blo ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa can yin yang rjes su 'gro ba ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bag chags kyi sa bon sad pa thob pas phul du byung ba can gyi blo ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa can yin yang rjes su 'gro ba ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: However, because of the activation of the seed of the latent impressions, the cognition that is endowed with excellence, even though it is not concomitant, appears to be concomitant.

original: mngon du phyogs par gyur pa'i bag chags smin pa can phyi rol la ltos pa med pa can gyi blo de nyid ji ltar yul tha dad pa can yin zhe na /
analyzed: mngon du phyogs par gyur pa'i bag chags smin pa can phyi rol la ltos pa med pa can gyi blo de nyid ji ltar yul tha dad pa can yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the cognition that is directed toward the ripening of the latent impressions, which is not dependent on an external object, has different objects?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: tha dad kyang dngos chos nyid kyis //
analyzed: tha dad kyang dngos chos nyid kyis //
translated: But the variegated and so on are the property of the thing.

original: don de 'dra ba rnams shes kyi //
analyzed: don de 'dra ba rnams shes kyi //
translated: The cognition of such an object is

original: rgyu yin gang la shes pa de ;
analyzed: rgyu yin gang la shes pa de ;
translated: the cause of the cognition of that.

original: / de dag de ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: / de dag de ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: It is understood in that way.

original: de ltar shes pa tha dad kyang //
analyzed: de ltar shes pa tha dad kyang //
translated: Thus, although the cognition is different,

original: tha dad med par rnam rtog phyir //
analyzed: tha dad med par rnam rtog phyir //
translated: because of the non-difference of the aspect,

original: de 'bras can min dang bral ba'i //
analyzed: de 'bras can min dang bral ba'i //
translated: it is not the result of that, nor is it free from that.

original: rjes 'gro dngos gcig la ma yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rjes 'gro dngos gcig la ma yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The universal is not in one thing.

original: khra bo la sogs pa'i don ni dngos po'i chos nyid kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa'i don ni dngos po'i chos nyid kyi yin gyi /
translated: Here, the meaning of variegated and so on is the property of the thing,

original: tha dad pa'i rigs la sogs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rigs la sogs ni ma yin te /
translated: but not of different universals and so on.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i rnam pa can de 'dra ba'i shes pa rang gi bdag nyid la tha dad pa yod kyang rgyu yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i rnam pa can de 'dra ba'i shes pa rang gi bdag nyid la tha dad pa yod kyang rgyu yin no //
translated: That cognition with a non-different aspect is the cause, even though it has a different nature of its own.

original: khra bo la sogs pa gang las tha mi dad par skyes pa'i shes pa de tha mi dad par skyes pas te /
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa gang las tha mi dad par skyes pa'i shes pa de tha mi dad par skyes pas te /
translated: The cognition that arises without difference from the variegated and so on arises without difference.

original: khra bo la sogs pa de dag mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa de dag mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The variegated and so on are understood in that way as having a similar nature.

original: 'di'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intended meaning of this is as follows:

original: gsal bas de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gsal bas de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa byed pa yin te /
translated: The consciousness that is such a manifestation is the agent,

original: shes pa gang gis bag chags kyi sa bon yongs su smin pa'i rim pas mtshungs pa'i rnam par yongs su rtog pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'o //üîΩdper na mngon par 'dod pa'i btsun mo mthong nas bde ba'i @68a * //
analyzed: shes pa gang gis bag chags kyi sa bon yongs su smin pa'i rim pas mtshungs pa'i rnam par yongs su rtog pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'o // dper na mngon par 'dod pa'i btsun mo mthong nas bde ba'i @68a * //
translated: because the consciousness that is the seed of the latent impressions generates the consciousness that is the aspect of the object through the process of the maturation of the seed.

original: bag chags yongs su smin pas bcad nas bde ba myong bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: bag chags yongs su smin pas bcad nas bde ba myong bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: For example, when one sees the queen one desires, the latent impression of pleasure matures and one experiences pleasure.

original: nang du khyad par can gyi bde ba rig pa ni phyi rol gyi gsal ba la bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rgyu med do //
analyzed: nang du khyad par can gyi bde ba rig pa ni phyi rol gyi gsal ba la bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rgyu med do //
translated: But the inner awareness of special pleasure does not have a cause called ‚Äúpleasure‚Äù in the external manifestation.

original: 'on te bde ba'i rnam pa nyid phyi rol gsal ba dang 'brel pa can rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te bde ba'i rnam pa nyid phyi rol gsal ba dang 'brel pa can rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Or, if the aspect of pleasure itself is not the realization of the external manifestation,

original: des na phyi rol ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na phyi rol ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not external.

original: de lta bas na 'o na rigs kyang gsal ba dang 'brel pa can du mi snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'o na rigs kyang gsal ba dang 'brel pa can du mi snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: If that is so, then the internal seed would not appear as connected to the manifestation.

original: shes pa nyid 'ba' zhig rnam pa mtshungs pa can du snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa nyid 'ba' zhig rnam pa mtshungs pa can du snang ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not that consciousness alone appears with a similar aspect.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na spyi yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na spyi yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of consciousness itself is the universal.

original: 'on te shes pa tha dad pa ni gsal ba so sor tha dad pa yin na de ji ltar shes pa gcig gi 'bras bu can du gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa tha dad pa ni gsal ba so sor tha dad pa yin na de ji ltar shes pa gcig gi 'bras bu can du gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But if the different consciousnesses are the individual manifestations, how can they be the effect of a single consciousness?

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gal te shes pa yang tha dad pa yin pa de lta na yang phan tshun tha dad pa yin yang tha mi dad par rtogs pa skyed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /üîΩshes pa la yang tha snyad mtshungs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te shes pa yang tha dad pa yin pa de lta na yang phan tshun tha dad pa yin yang tha mi dad par rtogs pa skyed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir / shes pa la yang tha snyad mtshungs par 'gyur te /
translated: Even if the consciousnesses are different, they are the cause for the production of a nondifferent understanding, because they are mutually different.

original: tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Consciousness is also similar in that it is the cause for the production of a nondifferent understanding.

original: de la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin no //üîΩ'on te 'bras bu gcig pa can de gsal ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin no // 'on te 'bras bu gcig pa can de gsal ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not that there is a different type.

original: spyi thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: spyi thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the universal is the cause for a single effect, it follows that it is a universal because it pervades all manifestations.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid las ma gtogs pa'i de'i 'bras bu can du snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid las ma gtogs pa'i de'i 'bras bu can du snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Because the universal does not appear as the effect of the nature of the particulars.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu med pa can dag las log pa'i dngos po rnams ni rjes su 'gro bar rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu med pa can dag las log pa'i dngos po rnams ni rjes su 'gro bar rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that things that are the opposite of having no effect follow from the particulars.

original: 'di ltar gcig de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pas tha dad pa de bzhin du gnyis pa yang yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar gcig de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pas tha dad pa de bzhin du gnyis pa yang yin gyi /
translated: Because in that way, one is not its effect, and it is different from that.

original: spyi dngos po gcig pa ni phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi dngos po gcig pa ni phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin no //
translated: The universal is not the effect of the external things.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it that the universal is not the effect of the external things?‚ÄùüîΩThe response is that the universal is not different from the external things.

original: 'o na ji ltar rigs phyi rol gyi don rnams la rtogs par gyur pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar rigs phyi rol gyi don rnams la rtogs par gyur pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the universal is not different from the external things, how is it that the external things are not the universal?‚Äù

original: ldog pa yang dngos por tha dad pa med pa'o //üîΩ'on te tha dad pa'i ldog pa yod na /üîΩrigs nyid la ldog pa'i sgras brjod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ldog pa yang dngos por tha dad pa med pa'o // 'on te tha dad pa'i ldog pa yod na / rigs nyid la ldog pa'i sgras brjod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The response is that the external things are not the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it that the external things are not the universal?‚ÄùüîΩThe response is that the external things are not the universal because the external things are not the effect of the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are not the universal, how is it that the external things are the particulars?‚ÄùüîΩThe response is that the external things are the particulars because the external things are the cause of the universal.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are the cause of the universal, how is it that the external things are not the universal?‚ÄùüîΩThe response is that the external things are not the universal because the external things are not the nature of the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are not the universal, how is it that the external things are the particulars?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir ldog pa dngos la yod //
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa dngos la yod //
translated: The response is that the external things are the particulars because the external things are the cause of the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are the cause of the universal, how is it that the external things are not the universal?‚ÄùüîΩThe response is that the external things are not the universal because the external things are not the nature of the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are not the universal, how is it that the external things are the particulars?‚Äù

original: sgra dngos de yi mthar thug yin //
analyzed: sgra dngos de yi mthar thug yin //
translated: The response is that the external things are the particulars because the external things are the cause of the universal.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúIf the external things are the cause of the universal, how is it that the external things are not the universal?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The response is that the external things are not the universal because the external things are not the nature of the universal.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can 'bras bu gcig la phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can 'bras bu gcig la phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yod do //
translated: The definition of a thing is that it is a single effect that is the reverse of what is not of its kind.

original: gang yang ldog pa tha dad pa med do zhe na brjod pa de ni 'dod pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang yang ldog pa tha dad pa med do zhe na brjod pa de ni 'dod pa nyid de /
translated: But if you say that there is no difference in the reverse of that, we reply that this is just what we want to prove.

original: log pa las ldog pa gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa las ldog pa gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reverse of that is not something else.

original: 'on kyang de nyid rigs @68b mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos por yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid rigs @68b mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos por yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But it is just that which exists as a thing that is the reverse of what is not of its kind.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las log pa 'bras bu gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las log pa 'bras bu gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mthar thug pa ste /
translated: The essence of the reverse of what is not of its kind is a single effect.

original: mthas gtugs pa gang yin pa de'i sgra nyid rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa dang ldan par phyi rol gyi dngos po la rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: mthas gtugs pa gang yin pa de'i sgra nyid rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa dang ldan par phyi rol gyi dngos po la rtog pa yin no //
translated: The finality of that is the limit of that. The sound of that is the external thing that is the reverse of what is not of its kind.

original: 'o na gal te bag chags las thob pa'i skye ba can blo yin la /
analyzed: 'o na gal te bag chags las thob pa'i skye ba can blo yin la /
translated: But if the mind is born from habitual tendencies,

original: phyi rol gyi don dang 'brel pa ma yin pa de lta na ni shes pa bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i phyir ji ltar phyi rol du mi slu ba yin /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don dang 'brel pa ma yin pa de lta na ni shes pa bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i phyir ji ltar phyi rol du mi slu ba yin /
translated: If it is not related to an external object, then how can it be non-deceptive with respect to external objects, since consciousness is generated from latent propensities?

original: de bas na rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i dngos po yongs su gcod par sgra las byung ba'i shes pas rigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bas na rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i dngos po yongs su gcod par sgra las byung ba'i shes pas rigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the cognition that arises from a word is reasonable to ascertain an entity that is the opposite of that which is dissimilar.

original: rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod pa ni don byed par nus pa yin la /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod pa ni don byed par nus pa yin la /
translated: The exclusion of that which is dissimilar is the capacity to perform a function.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyis rigs su khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyis rigs su khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: And that is to be accepted as a type through concomitance.

original: 'o na kyang don byed nus pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid las gzhan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na kyang don byed nus pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid las gzhan pa yin te /
translated: But the capacity to perform a function is different from its own characteristic.

original: de bas na nus pa yongs su bcad na rang gi mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de bas na nus pa yongs su bcad na rang gi mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, when the capacity is ascertained, the own characteristic is known.

original: phyi rol sgra yis ma shes par ni ma yin no zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: phyi rol sgra yis ma shes par ni ma yin no zhe na smras pa /
translated: It is not the case that the external object is not known by the word.

original: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod pa //
analyzed: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod pa //
translated: The exclusion of the capacity of the external object

original: mthar thug med na'ang de'i sgra ni //
analyzed: mthar thug med na'ang de'i sgra ni //
translated: is not ultimate, but its word

original: de yi mthar thug rnam rtog gi //
analyzed: de yi mthar thug rnam rtog gi //
translated: is the ultimate of conceptual thought.

original: gzugs brnyan la ni sbyor bar byed //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la ni sbyor bar byed //
translated: But it is applied to the reflection.

original: de phyir gzhan sel mthar thug phyir //üîΩsgra ni gzhan sel byed par brjod//
analyzed: de phyir gzhan sel mthar thug phyir // sgra ni gzhan sel byed par brjod//
translated: Therefore, because of the finality of the exclusion of other,

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: The word is said to perform the exclusion of other.

original: gzhan sel ba phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid can sgra yis ston pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid can sgra yis ston pa ma yin te /
translated: The exclusion of other does not indicate an external reality.

original: de lta na yang mthar thug pa de med kyang phyi rol pa rnams don gcig byed par nus pa de nyid rnam par gcod pa'i mthar thug pa de mtha' can gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang mthar thug pa de med kyang phyi rol pa rnams don gcig byed par nus pa de nyid rnam par gcod pa'i mthar thug pa de mtha' can gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: Even so, although that finality does not exist, the finality of the exclusion of that which is not able to perform a single function is the cause of the limit.

original: de'i sgra ni ba lang gi sgra'o //
analyzed: de'i sgra ni ba lang gi sgra'o //
translated: The word is the word ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de dag la de'i mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de dag la de'i mthar thug pa ste /
translated: Those images of objects that are based on conceptual thought are its finality.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan la sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan la sbyor ba yin no //
translated: It is applied to the reason for that.

original: phyi rol gyi don dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni phyi rol gyi don mthong ba las brgyud nas skye ba'i phyir don la mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni phyi rol gyi don mthong ba las brgyud nas skye ba'i phyir don la mi slu ba yin no //
translated: The reflection of conceptual thought that is related to an external object is nondeceptive with regard to the object because it arises indirectly from the perception of the external object.

original: de bas na phyi rol gyi gzhan sel ba mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na phyi rol gyi gzhan sel ba mthar thug pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the ultimate external exclusion is the object of engagement.

original: 'jug pa'i yul gang yin pa de'i dngos po de'i phyir gzhan sel ba sgras byed par brjod do //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul gang yin pa de'i dngos po de'i phyir gzhan sel ba sgras byed par brjod do //
translated: Because of that thing, the exclusion of other is expressed by the word.

original: sgra ni phyi rol du mthar thug pa yin te /üîΩgzhan las log pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bskyed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan las ldog pa la yang 'jug @69a * //
analyzed: sgra ni phyi rol du mthar thug pa yin te / gzhan las log pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bskyed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan las ldog pa la yang 'jug @69a * //
translated: The word is ultimate externally,

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it generates an image of understanding that has the aspect of being the opposite of other, and because it engages in the opposite of other.

original: 'di ltar rtog pas phyi rol du reg par mi byed kyang /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtog pas phyi rol du reg par mi byed kyang /
translated: In that case, although thought does not touch the external object,

original: rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po rnams la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir sel ba'i yul can du brjod do //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po rnams la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir sel ba'i yul can du brjod do //
translated: it is said to have an object of exclusion because it engages in things that are the opposite of dissimilar types.

original: sgra dang 'brel pa'i shes pa ni tha dad pa'i phyi rol par snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra dang 'brel pa'i shes pa ni tha dad pa'i phyi rol par snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the consciousness associated with the word the appearance of a separate external object?

original: de ci ste de shes pa'i ngo bo nyid can yin te /
analyzed: de ci ste de shes pa'i ngo bo nyid can yin te /
translated: Why is that? Because it has the nature of the cognition of that.

original: shes pas dben par shes pa de de las tha dad pa med par brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pas dben par shes pa de de las tha dad pa med par brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to say that the cognition of the object separate from the cognition is separate from it.

original: tha dad pa'i rgyu ni shes pa tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rgyu ni shes pa tha dad pa yin te /
translated: The cause of the difference is the difference of consciousness,üîΩbecause there is no cause of difference apart from the difference of appearance.

original: snang ba tha dad pa ma gtogs par tha dad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhe na 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa ma gtogs par tha dad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhe na 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we reply:

original: don gyi gzugs brnyan shes pa la//
analyzed: don gyi gzugs brnyan shes pa la//
translated: The appearance of the form of an object in consciousness

original: sgra las tha dad ltar snang ba //
analyzed: sgra las tha dad ltar snang ba //
translated: appears to be different from sound,

original: gang de don gyi bdag nyid min //üîΩde 'khrul bag chags rang bzhin can //
analyzed: gang de don gyi bdag nyid min // de 'khrul bag chags rang bzhin can //
translated: but it is not of the nature of an object.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is mistaken, having the nature of latent impressions.

original: sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la gnas pa'i tha dad pa bzhin du don gyi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i gzugs snang ba gang yin ba de ni don gyi bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la gnas pa'i tha dad pa bzhin du don gyi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i gzugs snang ba gang yin ba de ni don gyi bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of the form of the color, shape, etc. of an object in a consciousness that arises from sound is not of the nature of an object.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not the nature of an entity.

original: 'on kyang don gyi gzugs brnyan te /
analyzed: 'on kyang don gyi gzugs brnyan te /
translated: However, it is the reflection of an object.

original: shes pa la 'phos pa'i gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes pa la 'phos pa'i gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The reflection that is transferred to consciousness is not an entity,

original: me long gi dngos po las byung ba'i bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
analyzed: me long gi dngos po las byung ba'i bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin no //
translated: like the reflection of a face that arises from a mirror.

original: de don gyi gzugs brnyan yin gyi /
analyzed: de don gyi gzugs brnyan yin gyi /
translated: But it is a representation of an object,

original: dngos po ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: not an actual object. Why is this?

original: gang gi phyir 'khrul pa de don rtogs pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu can te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khrul pa de don rtogs pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu can te /
translated: Because that error is caused by the latent impressions of the realization of an object.

original: bag chags las skyes pa'i shes pa mthong ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bag chags las skyes pa'i shes pa mthong ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because a consciousness arisen from latent impressions that is seen is not an external object.

original: rmi lam na mthong ba'i rnam pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rmi lam na mthong ba'i rnam pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the appearance in a dream.

original: 'on te gang cung zad snang ba de thams cad dngos po'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gang cung zad snang ba de thams cad dngos po'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that whatever appears is all an object,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: snang ba las dngos po nyid med ngo zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba las dngos po nyid med ngo zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained that an object does not exist apart from an appearance.

original: 'on te rtogs pas gzhag pa'i gzugs brnyan shes pa'i ngo bo nyid sgra yis brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'on te rtogs pas gzhag pa'i gzugs brnyan shes pa'i ngo bo nyid sgra yis brjod pa ste /
translated: But if you say that the nature of a consciousness that is a representation established by an awareness is expressed by a word,

original: shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dngos po yin na /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dngos po yin na /
translated: and that the nature of a consciousness is an object,

original: de ji ltar sgra'i don bsgrub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar sgra'i don bsgrub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how could the meaning of a word not be established?üîΩWe say:

original: smras pa / sgra rnams kyis de brjod pa na ;
analyzed: smras pa / sgra rnams kyis de brjod pa na ;
translated: When words express that,

original: / don gyi cha gang rtags par 'gyur //
analyzed: / don gyi cha gang rtags par 'gyur //
translated: what part of the object is signified?

original: de ma rtogs na'ang de don can //
analyzed: de ma rtogs na'ang de don can //
translated: Even if it is not understood, it is meaningful.

original: brda byed pa ni don med 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: brda byed pa ni don med 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The use of a conventional symbol would be meaningless.

original: shes pas gzhag pa'i rnam pa ste sgra rnams kyi brjod pa na /üîΩsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi don phyi rol la don gyi cha shas gang zhig yod de ci yang med de /
analyzed: shes pas gzhag pa'i rnam pa ste sgra rnams kyi brjod pa na / sgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi don phyi rol la don gyi cha shas gang zhig yod de ci yang med de /
translated: When the aspects that are posited by consciousness are expressed by means of words,

original: rtog pa la brten pa'i @69b gzugs brnyan la zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa la brten pa'i @69b gzugs brnyan la zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: what part of the external object is the referent of the intrinsic identity of the object? Nothing at all, because the image that is based on thought is imagined.

original: 'o na gal te blo'i gzugs brnyan sgra yis rjod par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te blo'i gzugs brnyan sgra yis rjod par byed do zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the image of consciousness is expressed by means of words,

original: de lta na ni phyi rol rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na ni phyi rol rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then, because there is no understanding of the external object,

original: brda'i sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brda'i sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the use of a conventional symbol would be meaningless.

original: phyi rol pa de'i cha rtogs pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: phyi rol pa de'i cha rtogs pa med pa yin na /
translated: If there is no understanding of that part of the external object,

original: brda'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: brda'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur te /
translated: the use of a conventional symbol would be meaningless,

original: gang gi phyir de'i don can te phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa de dgos pa'i don gang la brda byed pa de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i don can te phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa de dgos pa'i don gang la brda byed pa de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the purpose of the use of a conventional symbol is the understanding of the external object, and that purpose would not exist.

original: phyi rol gyi don ston par byed pa'i don du brda byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don ston par byed pa'i don du brda byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: The signifier is used to indicate external objects, not anything else.

original: de ltar ni 'dod mod kyi sgra'i don gzhan sel ba yin zhing 'di phyir rol gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa de'i phyir de la yang brda sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dod mod kyi sgra'i don gzhan sel ba yin zhing 'di phyir rol gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa de'i phyir de la yang brda sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But the meaning of a word is the exclusion of other, and it is not of the nature of an external object. Therefore, a signifier cannot be used for that.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: sgras don cha ci brjod ce na //
analyzed: sgras don cha ci brjod ce na //
translated: What part of the meaning is expressed by the word?

original: de la gzhan sel brjod par bya //
analyzed: de la gzhan sel brjod par bya //
translated: The exclusion of other is expressed.

original: rnam pa de yang don la med //üîΩde brjod ji ltar don brten yin //
analyzed: rnam pa de yang don la med // de brjod ji ltar don brten yin //
translated: But that aspect does not exist in the object.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: How can the expression of that be based on the object?

original: dngos po las tha dad pa'i gzhan sel ba ni med de /
analyzed: dngos po las tha dad pa'i gzhan sel ba ni med de /
translated: Here, the exclusion of other is not different from the thing.

original: don gyi cha 'ga' zhig kho na gzhan sel ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi cha 'ga' zhig kho na gzhan sel ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is only a part of the meaning.

original: 'di ltar sgra yis don gyi cha shas ci zhig brjod ces /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra yis don gyi cha shas ci zhig brjod ces /
translated: In this way, what part of the meaning is expressed by the word?

original: 'dir 'dri ba 'di la lan ni sgra yis gzhan sel brjod par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dri ba 'di la lan ni sgra yis gzhan sel brjod par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the answer is that the word expresses the exclusion of other.

original: de yang blo yis gzhag pa'i rnam pa ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la med de /
analyzed: de yang blo yis gzhag pa'i rnam pa ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la med de /
translated: Moreover, the aspect that is posited by the mind does not exist in the external particular.

original: de'i blo'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i blo'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of that mind.

original: shes pa'i rnam pa ste brjod pa'i sgra ni ji ltar don la brten pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa ste brjod pa'i sgra ni ji ltar don la brten pa yin te /
translated: How can the aspect of consciousness, the word that expresses, be based on the object?

original: gang zhig phyi rol na med pa de de'i rnam pa la don gyi rnam par shes pa ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang zhig phyi rol na med pa de de'i rnam pa la don gyi rnam par shes pa ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is illogical for the aspect of that to be the aspect of the object, since it does not exist externally.

original: dper na rab rib can la skra shad snang bas don rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rab rib can la skra shad snang bas don rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the appearance of floating hairs to one with an eye disease not being the object.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang / rjes 'gro can sgra don 'bras kyang //üîΩrjes 'gro can 'gyur de yang ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rjes 'gro can sgra don 'bras kyang // rjes 'gro can 'gyur de yang ni //
translated: The result of the word that follows is alsoüîΩthat which follows.

original: rjes 'gro can min de blo las //
analyzed: rjes 'gro can min de blo las //
translated: That is not that which follows because it is not different from the mind.

original: tha mi dad phyir mthong goms yul //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tha mi dad phyir mthong goms yul // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The object of seeing and meditation.

original: gzhan sel ba ni spyi yin par 'dod de /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni spyi yin par 'dod de /
translated: Here, the exclusion of other is asserted to be the universal.

original: tshar pa dang glang ma la sogs pa shing ma yin pa las log pa rnams la shing zhes bya ba'i sgra rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshar pa dang glang ma la sogs pa shing ma yin pa las log pa rnams la shing zhes bya ba'i sgra rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the term ‚Äútree‚Äù is applicable to all those things that are the opposite of non-trees, such as stumps and sprouts.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi sgra de'i brjod par bya ba'i don dgos pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba can yin par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi sgra de'i brjod par bya ba'i don dgos pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba can yin par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: The meaning that is the referent of the term that is applicable is the purpose of the term that is applicable.

original: shes pa'i rnam pa de yang rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa de yang rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin te /
translated: But the aspect of consciousness is not applicable,

original: blo las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from the cognition.

original: blo de yang don so so ba la brten nas tha dad pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: blo de yang don so so ba la brten nas tha dad pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: And that cognition is not different, because it is based on individual objects.

original: blo de las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo de las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not different from that cognition,

original: rnam pa yang @70a * //
analyzed: rnam pa yang @70a * //
translated: the aspect

original: tha dad pa yin no //üîΩ'o na gal te shes pa'i rnam pa nyid 'di yin na ji ltar sngon por snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad pa yin no // 'o na gal te shes pa'i rnam pa nyid 'di yin na ji ltar sngon por snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: is also not different.üîΩIf the aspect of consciousness is just that, how does it appear as blue?

original: shes pa ni rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ji ltar 'di rnam pa dang 'dre ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa ni rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ji ltar 'di rnam pa dang 'dre ba yin zhe na /
translated: Since consciousness is by nature the apprehender, how is it mixed with the aspect?

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir phyi rol pa mthong ba goms pa yang dang yang du 'jug pa des sprul pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes ni phyi rol brgyud nas 'ongs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi rol pa mthong ba goms pa yang dang yang du 'jug pa des sprul pa'i phyir ro // des ni phyi rol brgyud nas 'ongs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the external object is created by the repeated practice of seeing it.

original: shes pa yang ba lang mi gsal ba dang 'dres par mthong ba'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa yang ba lang mi gsal ba dang 'dres par mthong ba'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the cognition is seen as unclear and mixed, because it comes from the external object through a medium.

original: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i phyir blo'i gzugs brnyan sgra'i brjod bya ma yin la /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i phyir blo'i gzugs brnyan sgra'i brjod bya ma yin la /
translated: Thus, it is taught that the reflection of cognition is not the content of the word-sound, because it is not universal.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po yang ma yin te /
translated: And the external object is not [the content of the word-sound],

original: rtogs pas gsal ba gzhan sel ba ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtogs pas gsal ba gzhan sel ba ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the clear cognition that excludes other [possibilities] is the nature of emptiness.

original: de yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And that also is not the content of the word-sound.

original: 'o na ji ltar spyi sgra'i brjod par bya bar brjod de /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar spyi sgra'i brjod par bya bar brjod de /
translated: Well then, how is the universal said to be the content of the word-sound?

original: blo'i gzugs brnyan ni re zhig sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: blo'i gzugs brnyan ni re zhig sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The reflection of cognition is not, for one thing, the content of the word-sound,

original: de sgra'i nye bar blang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sgra'i nye bar blang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the object of the word-sound.

original: sgra'i brjod bya yin pa de lta na yang gzugs brnyan ni shes pa bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra'i brjod bya yin pa de lta na yang gzugs brnyan ni shes pa bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Although it is the object of expression of a word, a reflection is not a universal because it is not shared in common with other consciousnesses, like consciousness itself.

original: spyi'i ngo bo nyid ni ma yin la /üîΩphyi rol gyi log pa ni sgra yis brten par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo nyid ni ma yin la / phyi rol gyi log pa ni sgra yis brten par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not a universal because it is not a universal.

original: ldog pa yongs su bcad na log pa'i dngos po nyid du shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ldog pa yongs su bcad na log pa'i dngos po nyid du shes pa yin gyi /
translated: An external negation is not the referent of a word because if the negation is ascertained, it is understood to be a nonentity.

original: dngos por gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not an entity.

original: 'on te phyi rol gyi dngos po mi shes na ni /
analyzed: 'on te phyi rol gyi dngos po mi shes na ni /
translated: If an external entity is not understood,

original: ji ltar 'o na dngos po'i cha shas su gyur pa gzhan sel ba sgra'i yul du 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar 'o na dngos po'i cha shas su gyur pa gzhan sel ba sgra'i yul du 'gyur /
translated: then how can the exclusion of other, which is a part of an entity, be the referent of a word?üîΩIf the part of an entity is not expressed, it is pointless to make a convention.

original: dngos po'i cha ma brjod par yang brda byed pa don med par 'gyur ro zhe na 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: dngos po'i cha ma brjod par yang brda byed pa don med par 'gyur ro zhe na 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: de yi ngo bo sgro 'dogs pa'i //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo sgro 'dogs pa'i //
translated: Because the conception that superimposes its entity

original: rtogs pas gzhan las log shes phyir //üîΩsgra don gang yin de nyid ces ;
analyzed: rtogs pas gzhan las log shes phyir // sgra don gang yin de nyid ces ;
translated: understands the exclusion of other,üîΩthere is no contradiction in saying

original: / brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med //
analyzed: / brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med //
translated: that the referent of a word is just that.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here is the explanation of this.

original: shes pa de'i ngo bo nyid sngon po la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba'i rnam pa de la phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du sgro 'dogs pa de rtogs pa de myong bas /
analyzed: shes pa de'i ngo bo nyid sngon po la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba'i rnam pa de la phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du sgro 'dogs pa de rtogs pa de myong bas /
translated: The experience of that is the realization of the aspect.

original: gzhan las log pa bzhin gzugs brnyan rtogs pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: gzhan las log pa bzhin gzugs brnyan rtogs pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Or, alternatively, it should be viewed as the realization of the reflection that is the opposite of other.

original: yang na gzhan las log pa'i phyi rol rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gzhan las log pa'i phyi rol rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: Or, alternatively, it should be viewed as the realization of external reality that is the opposite of other.üîΩJust as it is the opposite of one external object, it is the opposite of all other external objects.

original: ji ltar yang phyi rol gcig las log pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin par thams cad du rigs mtshungs par rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa mtshungs par shes la /
analyzed: ji ltar yang phyi rol gcig las log pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin par thams cad du rigs mtshungs par rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa mtshungs par shes la /
translated: In all cases, it is similar because it is the same type. It is known to be the opposite of dissimilar types.

original: bye brag so so ba la ni rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bye brag so so ba la ni rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But it is not the realization of individual particulars.

original: khyad par mi @70b rtogs pas de nyid rigs mi mthun pa las log pa la rigs zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: khyad par mi @70b rtogs pas de nyid rigs mi mthun pa las log pa la rigs zhes brjod kyi /
translated: Since it does not realize distinctions, it is called the same type that is the opposite of dissimilar types.

original: phyi rol dang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag la rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rigs yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol dang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag la rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rigs yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But the reflection of external reality and consciousness do not have the same type.

original: blo'i gzugs brnyan gal te mi ma yin pa las log pa me yin pa de lta na yang me ma yin pa las log pa'i me'i gzugs brnyan mi gsal bar 'di na snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: blo'i gzugs brnyan gal te mi ma yin pa las log pa me yin pa de lta na yang me ma yin pa las log pa'i me'i gzugs brnyan mi gsal bar 'di na snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Even if the mental image of fire is not a non-human being, the mental image of fire, which is the opposite of what is not fire, appears here in an unclear way.

original: nges pa'i stobs kyis rigs mi mthun pa las log pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: nges pa'i stobs kyis rigs mi mthun pa las log pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, by the power of ascertainment, it is said to be the opposite of what is not of the same type.

original: de bas na de ltar blo'i gzugs brnyan dngos po thams cad la sgro btags pa'i phyir mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de ltar blo'i gzugs brnyan dngos po thams cad la sgro btags pa'i phyir mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, the mental image is the same in all things because it is superimposed on all things.

original: de'i phyir gzhan las log pa'i blo'i gzugs brnyan nam phyi rol du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan las log pa'i blo'i gzugs brnyan nam phyi rol du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the mental image that is the opposite of other is the external object because it is the basis of attachment to the external.

original: sgra'i don gang yin zhes 'dri ba'i lan gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i don gang yin zhes 'dri ba'i lan gang yin pa ni /
translated: The answer to the question What is the meaning of the word?

original: shes pa'i rnam pa de nyid dang de nyid kyi phyi rol pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa de nyid dang de nyid kyi phyi rol pa'o //
translated: is that it is the aspect of consciousness itself, and that is the external object.

original: brjod pa de la 'gal ba ci yang med de /
analyzed: brjod pa de la 'gal ba ci yang med de /
translated: There is no contradiction at all in that statement.

original: gzhan las log pa'i phyi rol rtogs pa ni rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i dngos po'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan las log pa'i phyi rol rtogs pa ni rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i dngos po'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The external object that is the opposite of other is the property of an entity that is the opposite of what is not of the same type.

original: sgra ni dngos po la reg pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ni dngos po la reg pa'o //
translated: Sound is the contact with the object.

original: sgra yis bzhag pa'i shes pa ni gzugs brnyan nyams su myong bar gyur pas phyi rol rig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra yis bzhag pa'i shes pa ni gzugs brnyan nyams su myong bar gyur pas phyi rol rig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: The cognition that is established by sound is the experience of the reflection. Therefore, there is no awareness of external objects.

original: ji ltar de la 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar de la 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: How can it engage with the object?

original: 'o na gal te phyi rol mi snang ba de lta na yang /
analyzed: 'o na gal te phyi rol mi snang ba de lta na yang /
translated: If external objects do not appear,

original: nyer len sgra yis bskyed pa'i mthong bas shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyer len sgra yis bskyed pa'i mthong bas shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: then the object of engagement is not external, because it is produced by the appropriated sound and is known by seeing.

original: phyi rol du zhen nas 'jug pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: phyi rol du zhen nas 'jug pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If it is not engaged with by apprehending the external object,

original: zhen pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin te /üîΩgzung ba'i chos yin nam /
analyzed: zhen pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin te / gzung ba'i chos yin nam /
translated: then what is this so-called apprehension?üîΩIs it a phenomenon that is apprehended?

original: 'dzin pa'i chos yin grang na /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i chos yin grang na /
translated: Or is it a phenomenon that apprehends?

original: de la gal te gzung ba'i chos yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te gzung ba'i chos yin na /
translated: If it is a phenomenon that is apprehended,

original: de lta na ni gzung ba mi gsal ba nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na ni gzung ba mi gsal ba nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
translated: then because the appearance of the apprehended is unclear,

original: gzung ba la gsal ba'i rnam pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba la gsal ba'i rnam pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: the aspect of the clarity of the apprehended does not exist.

original: 'on te 'dzin pa'i chos zhen pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dzin pa'i chos zhen pa yin na /
translated: If it is a phenomenon that apprehends,

original: de lta na yang rtog pas gzung ba mi gsal ba'i rnam par 'jug pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang rtog pas gzung ba mi gsal ba'i rnam par 'jug pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: then conceptual cognition engages with the unclear aspect of the apprehended.

original: gsal ba'i rnam par 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i rnam par 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not engage in the aspect of clarity.

original: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang gsal ba'i rig par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang gsal ba'i rig par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the aspect of apprehension is not the illuminator of clarity.

original: de'i chos ni phyi rol par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩgzhan yang phyi rol la rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan du sgro 'dogs pa yin nam /
analyzed: de'i chos ni phyi rol par shes pa ma yin no // gzhan yang phyi rol la rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan du sgro 'dogs pa yin nam /
translated: Thus, the object of that is not consciousness of external things.üîΩMoreover, is the superimposition of external things on the image of conception?

original: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan la phyi drol du sgro 'dogs pa yin grang na /üîΩde la gal te phyogs dang po la brten na de lta na ni rtog pa'i rnam pa don byed par nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtog pa des phyir @71a * //
analyzed: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan la phyi drol du sgro 'dogs pa yin grang na / de la gal te phyogs dang po la brten na de lta na ni rtog pa'i rnam pa don byed par nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtog pa des phyir @71a * //
translated: Or is the superimposition of external things on the image of conception?

original: rol gyi don la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rol gyi don la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: If the former position is maintained, then since the aspect of conception is devoid of the capacity to perform a function, how could that conception engage external objects?

original: phyi rol pa'i don byed pa ni mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol pa'i don byed pa ni mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not comprehend external objects that perform a function.

original: 'on te rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la phyi rol du sgro 'dogs na de lta na yang phyi rol shes pa ma yin pas ji ltar sgro 'dogs par nus te /
analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la phyi rol du sgro 'dogs na de lta na yang phyi rol shes pa ma yin pas ji ltar sgro 'dogs par nus te /
translated: But if the superimposition of external things on the image of conception is maintained, then since it is not consciousness of external things, how could it be able to superimpose external things?

original: yul du ma byas par ni sgro 'dogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul du ma byas par ni sgro 'dogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, without taking on the aspect of an object, it is impossible to superimpose something.

original: gzhan yang gal te phyi rol shes pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes so zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te phyi rol shes pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes so zhe na /
translated: Moreover, if you say that the external object is known by the nature of consciousness,

original: de lta na yang shes pa'i phyogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang shes pa'i phyogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then, in that case, it would be the side of consciousness,

original: phyi rol gyi phyogs la ni ma yin te dper na chu ru sgro 'dogs pa skyes na smig rgyu ba'i phyogs su 'jug par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi phyogs la ni ma yin te dper na chu ru sgro 'dogs pa skyes na smig rgyu ba'i phyogs su 'jug par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: but not the side of the external object, just as when the superimposition of water arises, it is engaged in the side of a mirage.

original: de bas na rtog pas don mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de bas na rtog pas don mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ;
translated: Therefore, since conceptual thought does not apprehend objects,

original: mi 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: isn‚Äôt it the case that it does not engage with them?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: shes pa'i sgra yis nges sprul pa //
analyzed: shes pa'i sgra yis nges sprul pa //
translated: The sound that expresses consciousness

original: de dag log par snang ba nyid //
analyzed: de dag log par snang ba nyid //
translated: is the appearance of the opposite of those.
