original: don gyi cha rjes 'di 'gro'i phyir //
analyzed: don gyi cha rjes 'di 'gro'i phyir //
translated: Because it follows the part of the object,

original: sgra ni gzhan sel byed pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan sel byed pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: sound is the eliminator of other.

original: sgra yis sprul pa'i shes pa log par snang ba can nyid yin pa de'i phyir log par snang ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: sgra yis sprul pa'i shes pa log par snang ba can nyid yin pa de'i phyir log par snang ba'i phyir na /
translated: The sound that expresses consciousness is the appearance of the opposite of those. Because it is the appearance of the opposite,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid rtog pa med kyang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid rtog pa med kyang /
translated: even though it does not conceive the particular,

original: don gyi cha rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i rjes su 'gro ba bzhin du snang ba des na phyi rol du 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: don gyi cha rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i rjes su 'gro ba bzhin du snang ba des na phyi rol du 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: Just as the appearance of a rope as a snake is a case of the appearance of something that is the opposite of what is of a different type, so too is the appearance of a form and so on.

original: dngos po mthong bas 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po mthong bas 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the mind engages external objects, but it does not engage them by seeing real things.

original: 'khrul pa'i shes pas mya ngam gyi smig rgyu ba la sogs pa la 'jug gi / der chu dngos 'dzin pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i shes pas mya ngam gyi smig rgyu ba la sogs pa la 'jug gi / der chu dngos 'dzin pa ni ma yin la /
translated: A deluded consciousness engages a mirage in a desert and so on, but it does not apprehend water as a real thing there.

original: smig rgyu la 'khrul pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu la 'khrul pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it deluded about the mirage.

original: de bzhin du sgra las skyes pa'i shes pa 'di la yang gal te phyi rol mi snang bar gyur pa de lta na yang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra las skyes pa'i shes pa 'di la yang gal te phyi rol mi snang bar gyur pa de lta na yang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, even though external objects do not appear to the consciousness that arises from sound, it engages them by the power of delusion.

original: 'o na 'khrul pa nyid med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'khrul pa nyid med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt delusion itself nonexistent?

original: 'di ltar phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa ni 'khrul bar yang shes pa'i bdag nyid la sgro 'dogs pa yin nam /üîΩdon gyi bdag nyid la yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa ni 'khrul bar yang shes pa'i bdag nyid la sgro 'dogs pa yin nam / don gyi bdag nyid la yin /
translated: In this way, the superimposition of the opposite is a superimposition on the nature of consciousness.üîΩOr is it a superimposition on the nature of the object?

original: ci ste sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin te /
analyzed: ci ste sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin te /
translated: But what is the meaning of superimposition?

original: rang bzhin gzhan la 'jug pa yin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan la 'jug pa yin nam /
translated: Is it the nature of the other that is engaged?

original: 'on te rang bzhin gzhan du rtogs pa'i don gzhan yin grang na /
analyzed: 'on te rang bzhin gzhan du rtogs pa'i don gzhan yin grang na /
translated: Or is it the meaning of the other that is realized as the nature?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang sgro 'dogs pa med do //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang sgro 'dogs pa med do //
translated: In both cases, there is no superimposition.

original: 'on te med pa nyid la yod par zhen par gyur pa ni 'khrul pa'o zer na /
analyzed: 'on te med pa nyid la yod par zhen par gyur pa ni 'khrul pa'o zer na /
translated: If it is said that the conception of existence in nonexistence is delusion,

original: ma mthong ba'i don med pa nyid du ji ltar shes /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don med pa nyid du ji ltar shes /
translated: how is the meaning of nonseeing known to be nonexistence?

original: shes pa gzhan gyis shes te /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis shes te /
translated: It is known by another cognition.

original: de la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that it is because it does not observe that,

original: gal te mthong ba gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dis cir @71b 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dis cir @71b 'gyur te /
translated: then even if seeing is not the object of another, what is the point of that?

original: ha cang thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is too much of an absurdity.

original: rang mthong ba'i tshe na de shes pa'o zhes bsam par bya ba de bas na snang ba la 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang mthong ba'i tshe na de shes pa'o zhes bsam par bya ba de bas na snang ba la 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: When one sees oneself, one should think that it is known. Therefore it is not delusion with respect to appearance.

original: snang bar gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid la 'khrul pa med pa ni bden te /
analyzed: snang bar gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid la 'khrul pa med pa ni bden te /
translated: It is true that there is no delusion with respect to the nature of what appears.

original: 'di ltar rtog pa rnams rang gi ngo bo la byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtog pa rnams rang gi ngo bo la byed pa yin gyi /
translated: In this way, conceptions are with respect to their own nature.

original: phyi rol la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol la ni ma yin te /
translated: But not in external things.

original: rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni med pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of the conceptualization is not non-existent,

original: de rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is cognized.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po la ni rtog pa phyin ci log gis rnam par mthong ba'i phyir 'khrul ba yin gyi /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po la ni rtog pa phyin ci log gis rnam par mthong ba'i phyir 'khrul ba yin gyi /
translated: External things are mistaken because of the erroneous perception of conceptualization.

original: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i phyi rol du rtog pa'i byed pa med pa de bas na de la byed pa med pa nyid kyis phyi rol la ltos nas 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i phyi rol du rtog pa'i byed pa med pa de bas na de la byed pa med pa nyid kyis phyi rol la ltos nas 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since there is no activity of conceptualization in external things that are different from its own nature, therefore, it is mistaken in relation to external things because of the absence of activity.

original: de lta na yang 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa'i dbang gis phyin ci log tu 'dzin par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa'i dbang gis phyin ci log tu 'dzin par gzhag ste /
translated: Even so, it is posited as a mistaken apprehension due to the power of worldly attachment.

original: gang du ji ltar mthong ba'i don byed pa thob pa der slu ba med par skye ste /
analyzed: gang du ji ltar mthong ba'i don byed pa thob pa der slu ba med par skye ste /
translated: Where one obtains the function of the object as seen, there is non-deceptive arising.

original: gang du ji ltar snang ba'i don byed pa med pa der 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang du ji ltar snang ba'i don byed pa med pa der 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: Where there is no function of the object as it appears, there is just error.

original: sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa can gyi mthong ba skyes na mi gsal bar shes par gyur pa las 'das te /
analyzed: sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa can gyi mthong ba skyes na mi gsal bar shes par gyur pa las 'das te /
translated: When seeing arises following sound, it is unclear knowledge.

original: gsal ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du rigs so //
translated: because it is obtained as just clear.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa spong ba la 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa spong ba la 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in this way, because it generates a conceptual thought that is based on a thing that is the opposite of a dissimilar type, and because it engages in the exclusion of what is other than that,

original: sgra ni gzhan sel bar byed par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan sel bar byed par brjod par bya'o //
translated: sound is said to perform an exclusion of other.

original: 'o na gal te rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhan sel ba la sgra 'jug par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhan sel ba la sgra 'jug par 'gyur na /
translated: Now, if sound engages in the exclusion of other in a conceptual representation,

original: de lta na yang de nyid brda yang byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang de nyid brda yang byed par 'gyur te /
translated: then in that case, it would also perform a convention.

original: ji srid du mthong bas gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di ba lang yin no zhes brda byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du mthong bas gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di ba lang yin no zhes brda byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: For as long as one is able to posit the nature of a thing that is seen, one would perform a convention, saying, ‚ÄúThis is a cow.‚Äù

original: brdar byas pa'i don yang sgra yis brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: brdar byas pa'i don yang sgra yis brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: And because the meaning of the convention would be expressed by sound,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na sgra yis brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na sgra yis brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: only the intrinsic identity would be expressed by sound.üîΩIn response to this, it is said:

original: smras pa / de'i phyir brda yi dus na yang //
analyzed: smras pa / de'i phyir brda yi dus na yang //
translated: Therefore, even at the time of the convention,

original: rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras can gyis //
analyzed: rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras can gyis //
translated: The result of one‚Äôs own understanding

original: bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa yi //üîΩgzhan sel sgra la 'brel par 'gyur //
analyzed: bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa yi // gzhan sel sgra la 'brel par 'gyur //
translated: Is related to the meaning of the teaching.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The exclusion of other is related to sound.

original: de'i phyir mi gsal ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi shes pa'i rgyu sgra yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi gsal ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi shes pa'i rgyu sgra yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because sound is the cause of the cognition that is the reflection of an unclear conceptual image,

original: brda'i dus sa ma tha snyad kyi dus na yang gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: brda'i dus sa ma tha snyad kyi dus na yang gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur gyi /
translated: at the time of the convention, the time of the sign, the entity of the reflection is related to sound.

original: dngos po rang bzhin la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rang bzhin la ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not related to the nature of the thing.

original: 'di ba lang yin no zhes bya ba'i brda ni phyi rol nyid gsal @72a * //üîΩbar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ba lang yin no zhes bya ba'i brda ni phyi rol nyid gsal @72a * // bar snang ba yin gyi /
translated: The sign ‚ÄúThis is a cow‚Äù is the external appearance itself.

original: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: It is not a conceptual reflection.

original: de ji ltar de la sgra 'god pa'o zhes bya ba 'di las rjod par byed ce na /
analyzed: de ji ltar de la sgra 'god pa'o zhes bya ba 'di las rjod par byed ce na /
translated: How can it be said that the word is applied to it?

original: de ni mi rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not illogical.

original: gang gi phyir gal te 'di ni ba lang yin no zhes phyi rol gyi don bstan pa de lta na yang gzugs brnyan nyid la ltos par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te 'di ni ba lang yin no zhes phyi rol gyi don bstan pa de lta na yang gzugs brnyan nyid la ltos par byed do //
translated: Because even if the external object is indicated by ‚ÄúThis is a cow,‚Äù it is still dependent on the reflection.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di las 'di dus gzhan du shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di las 'di dus gzhan du shes par bya ba'o //
translated: In this way, it is said that this is the indicator of that, and from this, that is known at another time.

original: de'i phyir dus gzhan la khyab pa nyid du shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus gzhan la khyab pa nyid du shes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is known as pervading another time.

original: bstan par bya ba dang ston par byed pa gnyi ga yang brda ru 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba dang ston par byed pa gnyi ga yang brda ru 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Both the object indicated and the indicator are accepted as conventional.

original: dus gzhan gyi gzugs ni dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi gzugs ni dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
translated: The form of another time is not the object of the sense faculties.

original: de'i phyir 'di ba lang yin no zhes mdzub mos bstan pa'i don gsal ba dang 'brel ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ba lang yin no zhes mdzub mos bstan pa'i don gsal ba dang 'brel ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, this is a cow is related to the manifestation of the object indicated by the finger.

original: rtog pa ni gcig pa nyid du 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa ni gcig pa nyid du 'brel ba yin no //
translated: But the conception is related to the identity.

original: gzugs brnyan ni rang bzhin gzhan sel ba nyid sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni rang bzhin gzhan sel ba nyid sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur gyi khyad par ni ma yin no //
translated: The reflection is related to the exclusion of another nature, not to a particular.

original: 'on te 'di'i rjod par byed pa 'di yin no zhes pas dus gzhan du khyab pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bdag gcig pa nyid du zhen pas shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'di'i rjod par byed pa 'di yin no zhes pas dus gzhan du khyab pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bdag gcig pa nyid du zhen pas shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that consciousness is aware of the identity of the manifest and unmanifest at another time, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is its expression.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang 'di'i rngod par byed pa 'di yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kho na brda'i yul nyid du shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di'i rngod par byed pa 'di yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kho na brda'i yul nyid du shes pa yin gyi /
translated: Rather, it is aware of the mere intrinsic identity of the expression, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is its expression.‚Äù

original: gzugs brnyan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not a reflection.‚Äù

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not logical,

original: goms pa phul du byung ba las de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: goms pa phul du byung ba las de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one understands that way from the culmination of practice.

original: gang gi tshe yongs su gcod par byed pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar gzugs brnyan rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yongs su gcod par byed pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar gzugs brnyan rtogs par 'gyur la /
translated: When one ascertains, one must understand the reflection.

original: gang gi tshe yang tha snyad la brten nas sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa shes pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang tha snyad la brten nas sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa shes pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one understands the relation between words and referents based on conventions,

original: gdon mi za bar dus gzhan du gyur pa'i rang bzhin shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar dus gzhan du gyur pa'i rang bzhin shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: one must understand the intrinsic identity that occurs at another time.

original: 'di ltar bum pa khyer la shog ces pa'i tshig las bum pa khyer nas 'ong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar bum pa khyer la shog ces pa'i tshig las bum pa khyer nas 'ong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because of the words ‚ÄúBring the pot,‚Äù one brings the pot.

original: 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs par gyur nas kho bos kyang 'di lta bu nyid du shes par bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs par gyur nas kho bos kyang 'di lta bu nyid du shes par bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having understood that ‚ÄúThis is its name,‚Äù one thinks, ‚ÄúI will understand it in this way.‚Äù

original: 'o na gzugs brnyan la don byed pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na gzugs brnyan la don byed pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that a reflection does not perform a function?

original: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan shes par bya ba'i don du ji ltar brda sbyor ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan shes par bya ba'i don du ji ltar brda sbyor ba yin zhe na /
translated: So how can a convention be established in order to understand a reflection?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu don gang la yod pa de dang 'brel pa ni sgra la 'brel par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las log pa'i rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu don gang la yod pa de dang 'brel pa ni sgra la 'brel par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The term is related to the object that is the result of the understanding of the thing that is the opposite of what is dissimilar.

original: gang gis brda don med par 'gyur ba'i @72b rang rgyud pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis brda don med par 'gyur ba'i @72b rang rgyud pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the term is related to the thing itself.üîΩOr else, the term is related to the exclusion of other, which has the nature of the opposite of the object that is indicated,

original: yang na nye bar bstan pa'i don gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i gzhan sel ba ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid can ni sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na nye bar bstan pa'i don gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i gzhan sel ba ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid can ni sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur te /
translated: because the object that is indicated is a reflection.

original: gzugs brnyan pa de yang ldog pa rtogs pa'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan pa de yang ldog pa rtogs pa'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: And that reflection is the effect of the understanding of the exclusion,

original: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i ni ma yin te /
translated: but not of the understanding of its own nature,

original: gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid don la med pa'i phyir dang / ldog pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid don la med pa'i phyir dang / ldog pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the reflection does not exist in reality, and because the exclusion does exist.

original: 'on kyang gzhan las ldog pa tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan las ldog pa tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: However, it is not a different exclusion from that.

original: 'o na yang rtog pas gsal ba'i tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: 'o na yang rtog pas gsal ba'i tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: Nevertheless, it is because of the conceptual designation of the clear term.

original: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid dam rigs la brda mi byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid dam rigs la brda mi byed ce na /
translated: If one says that a signifier is not made for a specific property or a type,üîΩthen it is said:

original: smras pa / gzhan du mthong med la ltos phyir //
analyzed: smras pa / gzhan du mthong med la ltos phyir //
translated: Because of the dependence on not seeing elsewhere,

original: la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
analyzed: la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
translated: and because of the dependence on seeing it somewhere,

original: gzhan sel sgra la 'brel 'gyur gyi //üîΩde ni dngos la mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan sel sgra la 'brel 'gyur gyi // de ni dngos la mi rung ngo //
translated: the term of the exclusion of other is related,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: but that is not possible for the real thing.

original: sgra ni rigs mi mthun pa gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rigs mthun pa la la la sgra de mthong ba la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra ni rigs mi mthun pa gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rigs mthun pa la la la sgra de mthong ba la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, the term is not seen in other dissimilar types, and because of the dependence on seeing that term in some similar types,

original: gzhan sel ba nyid sgra la 'brel pa yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba nyid sgra la 'brel pa yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: and that the word is related to the exclusion of other.

original: gal te yang gsal ba la sgra sbyor bar byed na rigs mthun pa thams cad las mthong ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yang gsal ba la sgra sbyor bar byed na rigs mthun pa thams cad las mthong ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word is applied to the individual, then it follows, absurdly, that the word is applied to all similar individuals.

original: gal te spyi la sgra sbyor bar byed na gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te spyi la sgra sbyor bar byed na gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word is applied to the universal, then it does not depend on the observation of something else.

original: gal te ma bzung ba dang tha dad pa can dang 'brel pa'i rigs kyi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te ma bzung ba dang tha dad pa can dang 'brel pa'i rigs kyi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: If the word is applied to the universal in order to understand the universal that is related to that which is not apprehended as different,

original: rigs mi mthun pa ma mthong pa ma mthong ba la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa ma mthong pa ma mthong ba la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it depends on the observation of the nonobservation of dissimilar instances.

original: de lta mod kyang rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa nyid du 'gyur bas rigs brtags pas ci zhig dgos /
analyzed: de lta mod kyang rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa nyid du 'gyur bas rigs brtags pas ci zhig dgos /
translated: Even so, since it would be the dissimilar instances that are excluded, what is the use of postulating a universal?

original: gsal ba nyid ni rigs mi mthun pa la log par rtogs par bya'i /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni rigs mi mthun pa la log par rtogs par bya'i /
translated: The individual itself should be understood to be the opposite of dissimilar instances.

original: rigs kyis ci zhig /'on te nges pa'i khyad par can gyi gsal ba mi shes so zhe na /
analyzed: rigs kyis ci zhig /'on te nges pa'i khyad par can gyi gsal ba mi shes so zhe na /
translated: What is the use of a universal? But if you say that the individual is not understood to have a specific identity,üîΩthen the answer is this.

original: gsal bar rtog pa med na rigs nges par gyur pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gsal bar rtog pa med na rigs nges par gyur pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If it is not a clear conception, then what is the use of determining the type?

original: 'on te sgra'i shes par gyur pa'i rigs kyis don bya ba byed pa'i phyir gsal ba khong du chud par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sgra'i shes par gyur pa'i rigs kyis don bya ba byed pa'i phyir gsal ba khong du chud par byed do zhe na /
translated: But if you think that the type of cognition that is a sound determines the individual because it performs a function,

original: 'dir dang bo ni rigs yin la phyis ni gsal bar rigs kyi gnyis su shes sam ;
analyzed: 'dir dang bo ni rigs yin la phyis ni gsal bar rigs kyi gnyis su shes sam ;
translated: then do you think that the type is first and the individual is later?

original: 'on te shes pa nyid la dang po ni ba lang tsam shes la phyis ni nag mo la sogs par shes pa yin grang na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa nyid la dang po ni ba lang tsam shes la phyis ni nag mo la sogs par shes pa yin grang na /
translated: Or do you think that the cognition is first, that it merely cognizes an ox, and that later it cognizes a specific ox, such as a black one?

original: tshig 'di ni bcud med pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig 'di ni bcud med pa yin te /
translated: This statement is meaningless.

original: ba lang gi sgrar snang ba na nag mo la sogs pa'i bye brag shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang gi sgrar snang ba na nag mo la sogs pa'i bye brag shes pa ma yin te /
translated: When the word ox appears, it is not a cognition of a specific ox, such as a black one.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dang 'gal ba yin no //üîΩde bas na khyad par @73a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dang 'gal ba yin no // de bas na khyad par @73a * //
translated: This contradicts ordinary linguistic usage.

original: med pa tsam du shes pa yin te /
analyzed: med pa tsam du shes pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is merely a cognition of the absence of a specific object.

original: de ni spyi yin gyi rigs rtogs pas khyad par mtshon par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni spyi yin gyi rigs rtogs pas khyad par mtshon par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That is a universal, but it is not reasonable to determine a specific object by cognizing a type.

original: 'on te gdon mi za bar khyad par 'ga' zhig yod pa'i phyir mtshon pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gdon mi za bar khyad par 'ga' zhig yod pa'i phyir mtshon pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the word is a metaphor because there is no doubt about some difference,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: 'di la brjod pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the word does not apply to this.

original: de la rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'am med par sgrub pa'i tshad ma yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'am med par sgrub pa'i tshad ma yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For there is no valid cognition establishing the existence or nonexistence of a specific property in that.

original: mtshon par byed pa'i rigs kyang sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshon par byed pa'i rigs kyang sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la snang ba ma yin te /
translated: And the type of metaphor is not apparent in the cognition arising from the word,

original: de'i phyir rtogs pa nyid dngos po la reg pa med par sgras bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs pa nyid dngos po la reg pa med par sgras bskyed pa yin no //
translated: so the cognition itself is produced by the word without touching the real thing.

original: 'o na gal te blo nyid khyad par med pa can gyi yul can sgra las skyes pa yin na gzhan sel ba nyid ji ltar sgra'i brjod par bya bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te blo nyid khyad par med pa can gyi yul can sgra las skyes pa yin na gzhan sel ba nyid ji ltar sgra'i brjod par bya bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But if the cognition is produced by the word as the subject with no difference, how can the exclusion of other be the content of the word?

original: gzhan spong bas 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan spong bas 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: We say that it has the content of the exclusion of other because it operates by excluding other.

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la ltos pa de ni rigs sam gsal ba'i dngos po brjod par bya bar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la ltos pa de ni rigs sam gsal ba'i dngos po brjod par bya bar mi rung ngo //
translated: That which depends on seeing and not seeing is not suitable to be expressed as a thing of a type or a manifestation.

original: sgra ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: sgra ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: Sound is a mere indication.

original: rtags la yang 'brel par ni gzhan sel ba yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //üîΩde'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan dag / don la'ang yod min de la'ang sgra //
analyzed: rtags la yang 'brel par ni gzhan sel ba yin no zhes bsam par bya'o // de'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan dag / don la'ang yod min de la'ang sgra //
translated: One should understand that in the case of a sign, it is the exclusion of other that is related.üîΩTherefore, even in the case of an object,

original: mi sbyor gzhan la ldog pa la //üîΩsgra rnams nyid ni sbyor phyir ro //
analyzed: mi sbyor gzhan la ldog pa la // sgra rnams nyid ni sbyor phyir ro //
translated: a type and so on are not present, and a word is not applied to it.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because words are applied to the exclusion of other.

original: de'i phyir te rigs la sogs pa tha dad pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir te rigs la sogs pa tha dad pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is because a difference in type and so on is not seen and because there is no inference.

original: phyi rol gyi don la rigs la sogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la rigs la sogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: A type and so on are not present in external objects.

original: rigs la sogs pa de rnams la 'brel ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa de rnams la 'brel ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Those types and so on are also not related to them

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not observed as objects of observation.

original: rigs la sogs pa de rnams la yang sgra sbyor bar mi byed de /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa de rnams la yang sgra sbyor bar mi byed de /
translated: Words are not applied to those types and so on.

original: gzhan las ldog pa nyid la sgra rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa nyid la sgra rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because words are applied to the very opposite of that.

original: de bas na rigs la sogs pa dang 'brel pa sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rigs la sogs pa dang 'brel pa sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the application is not to the universal, etc.

original: 'on te mig gi shes pa la rdzas dang sbyor ba yod de dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khyad par tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te mig gi shes pa la rdzas dang sbyor ba yod de dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khyad par tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But if there is an application to the substance of the visual cognition, because the difference of the stick, etc. is seen,

original: ji ltar sgra dang sbyor ba yang mngon sum gyis bzlog par mi nus te /
analyzed: ji ltar sgra dang sbyor ba yang mngon sum gyis bzlog par mi nus te /
translated: how can the application to the word be refuted by perception?

original: brda'i dus na rdzas las tha dad par sgrar snang ba yod pa yin no //
analyzed: brda'i dus na rdzas las tha dad par sgrar snang ba yod pa yin no //
translated: For at the time of the convention, the word appears as different from the substance.

original: 'o na da ni de la sgra yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na da ni de la sgra yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But now, the word does not exist in that.

original: de la gal te de'i sgra med pa de lta na yang dran pas gzhag pa'i brda'i dus su mthong ba'i sgra yis dngos po bcad nas 'di ni ba @73b lang yin no zhes mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gal te de'i sgra med pa de lta na yang dran pas gzhag pa'i brda'i dus su mthong ba'i sgra yis dngos po bcad nas 'di ni ba @73b lang yin no zhes mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word does not exist in that, then by the word seen at the time of the convention established by memory, the thing is excluded and one sees, ‚ÄúThis is a cow.‚Äù

original: de bas na rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how can it be non-conceptual perception?üîΩIt is said:

original: smras pa / brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyis //
analyzed: smras pa / brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyis //
translated: By the one having the cause of the memory of the convention,

original: mthong ba bsres pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: mthong ba bsres pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: The self is mixed with the seen.

original: snga phyir rtogs pas steng ba yis //üîΩmig shes la de ji ltar yod //
analyzed: snga phyir rtogs pas steng ba yis // mig shes la de ji ltar yod //
translated: Because of the realization of the prior and subsequent,

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: how can that exist in the eye consciousness?

original: rdzas la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzas la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because there is no application to substance,

original: rnam pa gnyis su snang ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su snang ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the appearance of the two is not existent.

original: 'on te rnam pa gnyis nyid dbyug pa can du rtog pas shes pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa gnyis nyid dbyug pa can du rtog pas shes pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is the knowledge that conceives the two aspects as a stickman,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rtog pa med pa'i shes pa la yang dbyug pa dang skyes bu'i rnam pa snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i shes pa la yang dbyug pa dang skyes bu'i rnam pa snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the aspect of the stick and the person appears in nonconceptual consciousness,

original: dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag rnam par rtog pas shes par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag rnam par rtog pas shes par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how can the stick and the person be known by conception?

original: 'on te dbyug pa dang skyes bu'i rnam pa mngon du byed pa rtog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dbyug pa dang skyes bu'i rnam pa mngon du byed pa rtog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the manifestation of the aspect of the stick and the person is conception,

original: 'o na rnam pa gnyis mngon sum du byed pa'i rtog par gal te byed na ni /
analyzed: 'o na rnam pa gnyis mngon sum du byed pa'i rtog par gal te byed na ni /
translated: then if it is the conception that manifests the two aspects,

original: de'i tshe 'dod pa nyid de gnod pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'dod pa nyid de gnod pa ci yang med do //
translated: at that time it is just what we assert, and there is no harm at all.

original: 'on te dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag ldan par snang ba des na sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag ldan par snang ba des na sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the stick and the man are connected because they appear to be connected,

original: ldan pa gal te dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag las tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ldan pa gal te dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag las tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: then how can they be connected if the connection does not appear to be different from the stick and the man?

original: de lta na ni ldan pa de yang rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang ba'i phyir ci zhig sbyor ba yin /
analyzed: de lta na ni ldan pa de yang rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang ba'i phyir ci zhig sbyor ba yin /
translated: If the connection appears to exist by its own intrinsic reality, then what is there to connect?

original: ldan pa ni tha dad pa ni ma yin te mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pa ni tha dad pa ni ma yin te mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The connection is not different because it does not appear.

original: dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyis de lta bur gyur par skye ba mthong ba'i yul yin gyi /üîΩldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyis de lta bur gyur par skye ba mthong ba'i yul yin gyi / ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The stick and the man are seen to arise in that way, but the connection is not.

original: 'on te gang tha dad par yod pa de ni de ltar ldan pa zhes bya bar shes pas ldan pa yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gang tha dad par yod pa de ni de ltar ldan pa zhes bya bar shes pas ldan pa yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the connection exists because it is known that whatever exists as different is connected,

original: de lta mod kyi sngar gyi tha dad ba'i gnas skabs dran na ldan pa rtogs kyi dbang po las skyes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi sngar gyi tha dad ba'i gnas skabs dran na ldan pa rtogs kyi dbang po las skyes pa ma yin te /
translated: then we reply that the connection is understood when the previous state of difference is remembered, but it is not produced by the sense faculties.

original: snga phyi'i dngos po la dbang po rnams 'jug pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga phyi'i dngos po la dbang po rnams 'jug pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the senses do not engage with past and future things.

original: gzhan yang ldan pa yod na yang lag pas gzung ba'i dbyug pa nyid kyis dbyug pa can gyis tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir sngar byas pa'i brda gang yin pa de'i rgyu can du dbyug pa can zhes bya ba'i ldan pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan yang ldan pa yod na yang lag pas gzung ba'i dbyug pa nyid kyis dbyug pa can gyis tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir sngar byas pa'i brda gang yin pa de'i rgyu can du dbyug pa can zhes bya ba'i ldan pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Moreover, if there were possession, then the expression ‚Äúman with a stick‚Äù would be made by the stick that is held by the hand, and the possession called ‚Äúman with a stick‚Äù would be the cause of the prior expression.

original: sgra sbor ba yang brda las skyes pa ste /üîΩ'di ltar 'di ba lang yin no zhes bya ba ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba 'di yin zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: sgra sbor ba yang brda las skyes pa ste / 'di ltar 'di ba lang yin no zhes bya ba ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba 'di yin zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The addition of the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is also due to convention.üîΩIn this case, the meaning of ‚ÄúThis is a cow‚Äù is ‚ÄúThis is the referent of the word ‚Äòcow.‚Äô‚Äù

original: ba lang gi sgras 'di shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgras 'di shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of ‚ÄúThis is to be known by the word ‚Äòcow‚Äô‚Äù is ‚ÄúThis is to be known by the word ‚Äòcow.‚Äô‚Äù

original: ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba yang brda yis shes pa yin te /
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba yang brda yis shes pa yin te /
translated: The referent of the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is known by convention.

original: brda ni 'das pa'i dus na yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brda ni 'das pa'i dus na yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the convention exists in the past,

original: brda dran pa de nyid kyi thabs gang la yod pa'i rdzas @74a * //
analyzed: brda dran pa de nyid kyi thabs gang la yod pa'i rdzas @74a * //
translated: the substance that has the method of remembering that convention

original: kyi khyad par can dang sgra'i khyad par can 'dzin pa de de lta bu'o //üîΩbrda'i dus dang tha snyad kyi dus na mthong ba'i 'dres pa 'di ni ba lang de yin na zhes gcig tu byed pa'i bdag gang la yod pa de rdzas dang sgra'i khyad par can 'dzin pa mig gis shes par ji ltar 'gyur te ma yin no //üîΩji lta bu'i zhig ce na /üîΩsnga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa de yis stong pa'o //üîΩdes ni gtan tshigs bstan te /
analyzed: kyi khyad par can dang sgra'i khyad par can 'dzin pa de de lta bu'o // brda'i dus dang tha snyad kyi dus na mthong ba'i 'dres pa 'di ni ba lang de yin na zhes gcig tu byed pa'i bdag gang la yod pa de rdzas dang sgra'i khyad par can 'dzin pa mig gis shes par ji ltar 'gyur te ma yin no // ji lta bu'i zhig ce na / snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa de yis stong pa'o // des ni gtan tshigs bstan te /
translated: The cognition of the universal of cow and the cognition of the word cow are of that nature.

original: mig gi shes pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid de snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pas stong pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus dang 'brel pa'i don la dbang po rnams 'jug gi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la ma yin no //üîΩmngon sum gyis shes pa ni dbang po la brten pa'i don can yin no //
analyzed: mig gi shes pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid de snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pas stong pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus dang 'brel pa'i don la dbang po rnams 'jug gi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la ma yin no //üîΩmngon sum gyis shes pa ni dbang po la brten pa'i don can yin no //

original: 'on te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la dbang po 'jug pa yang brda las yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la dbang po 'jug pa yang brda las yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the sense faculty engages the past and future due to a sign,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so,

original: ma 'ongs pa yang de la sngar snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yang de la sngar snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because the future would appear to it as well.

original: 'on te sngar sgra'i brjod par bya ba shes pa gang yin pa de rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sngar sgra'i brjod par bya ba shes pa gang yin pa de rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the comprehension of the object of expression of a sound is the comprehension of the object,

original: sgra'i brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yang tha snyad kyi dus su rtogs pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra'i brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yang tha snyad kyi dus su rtogs pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: then the comprehension of the object of expression of a sound is not the comprehension of the object at the time of conventional expression, is it?

original: 'on te rjod par byed pa'i sgra dran pa las de'i brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rjod par byed pa'i sgra dran pa las de'i brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the comprehension of the object of expression of a sound is due to recalling the sound that expresses it,

original: de lta na ni dran pa nyid brjod par bya ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta na ni dran pa nyid brjod par bya ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: then is it not the case that the sound itself is comprehended as the object of expression?

original: 'on te dran par gyur pas ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba dang lhan cig snang ba'i rnam pa mngon sum gyis shes pa yin no zhen /
analyzed: 'on te dran par gyur pas ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba dang lhan cig snang ba'i rnam pa mngon sum gyis shes pa yin no zhen /
translated: But if you say that the object of expression of the sound ‚Äúcow‚Äù appears simultaneously with the recollection,

original: dran pa'i tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: dran pa'i tshad ma ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: then is it not the case that recollection is not a valid cognition?

original: des gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is posited by that does not exist.

original: 'di ltar dngos po nub par gyur kyang dran pas gzhag pa'i gzugs snang bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po nub par gyur kyang dran pas gzhag pa'i gzugs snang bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: For, although the entity has disappeared, the form that is posited by memory appears.

original: / de'i phyir dran par gyur pa'i don dang ldan cig pa la mngon sum 'jug pa ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: / de'i phyir dran par gyur pa'i don dang ldan cig pa la mngon sum 'jug pa ni med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the object of memory exists, direct perception does not operate.

original: 'on te dngos po gzhan mthong ba na tha dad pa'i yul can de dran pa mi bden pa yin gyi tha mi dad pa'i yul can de nyid 'di yin no zhes dran pa ni bden pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po gzhan mthong ba na tha dad pa'i yul can de dran pa mi bden pa yin gyi tha mi dad pa'i yul can de nyid 'di yin no zhes dran pa ni bden pa yin te /
translated: But if, when one sees another entity, the memory of that is not true with regard to a different object, but the memory that thinks ‚ÄúThat is this very thing‚Äù is true,

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa yin no zhes sems pa dang / de'i sgra yin no snyam sems pa ni mngon sum ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa yin no zhes sems pa dang / de'i sgra yin no snyam sems pa ni mngon sum ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and one thinks that the object performs a function, and the thought that it is the sound is not direct perception.

original: sngar mthong ba'i don byed pa dran pa dang / don byed pa dang rjod par byed pa'i sgra la mngon sum 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i don byed pa dran pa dang / don byed pa dang rjod par byed pa'i sgra la mngon sum 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The memory of the performance of a function of an object seen previously and the direct perception of the performance of a function and the sound that expresses it are not true.

original: gzhan yang gal te don byed pa de 'dir mthong ba de lta na ni sngar mthong ba nyid kyi dngos @74b por ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te don byed pa de 'dir mthong ba de lta na ni sngar mthong ba nyid kyi dngos @74b por ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if it is seen here that it performs a function, then how could it be seen previously?

original: de nyid kyis don bya ba byed pa yin no zhes bya bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis don bya ba byed pa yin no zhes bya bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not ascertained that it performs a function by that alone.

original: 'on te mtshams sbyor bas mtshungs pa yin no zhes mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te mtshams sbyor bas mtshungs pa yin no zhes mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is seen that it is similar due to its connection,

original: gal te snga ma dang phyi ma dag la gcig pa nyid med na ji ltar mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gal te snga ma dang phyi ma dag la gcig pa nyid med na ji ltar mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: if the former and latter are not the same, how could there be a connection?

original: mtshams sbyor bar byed ba yang su zhig yin /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor bar byed ba yang su zhig yin /
translated: And who connects?

original: mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dang mtshams sbyor bar bya ba'i yul la gcig pa nyid med par gyur na ni ngo shes pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dang mtshams sbyor bar bya ba'i yul la gcig pa nyid med par gyur na ni ngo shes pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the object of the connector and the connected are not the same, recognition would not exist.

original: dran pa dang mthong ba las tha dad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba gzhan med pa'i phyir dang / mthong bas kyang snga ma dang phyi ma mtshams sbyor ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dran pa dang mthong ba las tha dad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba gzhan med pa'i phyir dang / mthong bas kyang snga ma dang phyi ma mtshams sbyor ba ma yin te /
translated: Because there is no connection other than memory and seeing, and seeing does not connect the former and latter.

original: nye ba tsam zhig 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba tsam zhig 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it apprehends only what is near.

original: 'on te nye bar mthong ba mtshams sbyor ba bdag yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar mthong ba mtshams sbyor ba bdag yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the self is the one who sees what is near,

original: bdag gis kyang mthong ba'i stobs kyis don nyams su myong ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mthong ba'i stobs kyis don nyams su myong ba yin gyi /
translated: then the self would experience the object by the power of seeing,

original: rang rgyud pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang rgyud pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but it would not be the one who sees,

original: gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not apprehend in the state of sleep.

original: mthong ba yang dbang po la brten pa yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba yang dbang po la brten pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, seeing is based on the sense faculty,

original: dbang po yang snga ma dang phyi mar 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po yang snga ma dang phyi mar 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and the sense faculty does not engage in the past or future.

original: 'on te dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba can gyi shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos por 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba can gyi shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos por 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cognition that follows the sense faculty engages in the state of the past and future,

original: 'o na ni de ltar dbang po la brten pa nyid du shes pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'o na ni de ltar dbang po la brten pa nyid du shes pa mi 'thad de /
translated: then it is not tenable that cognition is based on the sense faculty in that way,

original: gal te gang du dbang po 'jug pa dang ldan pa der mngon sum 'jug par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gang du dbang po 'jug pa dang ldan pa der mngon sum 'jug par 'gyur na /
translated: because if direct perception engages where the sense faculty engages,

original: de'i tshe dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: then it follows the sense faculty and is not something else.

original: de bas na dbang po las skyes pa'i shes pa ni nye btsam zhig snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na dbang po las skyes pa'i shes pa ni nye btsam zhig snang ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, a consciousness that arises from a sense faculty is a mere apprehension of what is present.

original: snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi mar rtog pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not a conception of what is past or future.

original: brda dran pa la ltos pa'i skye ba dang / tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nye ba tsam zhig 'dzin par grub bo //
analyzed: brda dran pa la ltos pa'i skye ba dang / tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nye ba tsam zhig 'dzin par grub bo //
translated: Therefore, it is established that a consciousness that arises in dependence on the memory of a sign is a mere apprehension of what is present, because it is different from the memory of a sign.

original: 'on te rig pa thams cad ni rtog pa dang bcas par nyams su myong ba yin no zhe na brda 'dzin pa med na sgra'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te rig pa thams cad ni rtog pa dang bcas par nyams su myong ba yin no zhe na brda 'dzin pa med na sgra'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba can ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that all awarenesses are experienced as conceptions, then we reply that without the apprehension of a sign, there is no experience of the aspect of a sound.

original: de ni rtog pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ni rtog pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt that a conception?

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gal te khyad par can gyi sgra'i rnam pa ba brda med par mi snang ba de lta na yang ci yang rung brjod par byed ba'i spyi'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis rig pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i tha snyad mi rung ba'i
analyzed: gal te khyad par can gyi sgra'i rnam pa ba brda med par mi snang ba de lta na yang ci yang rung brjod par byed ba'i spyi'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis rig pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i tha snyad mi rung ba'i
translated: Even if the aspect of a particular sound does not appear without a sign, still, because the experience of awareness possesses the aspect of the mere sound that is to be expressed, it is not possible to call it nonconceptual.

original: phyir ro // gzhan yang gal te thams cad du sgra sbyor ba med pa de lta na yang shes pa rtog pa med pa ma yin te /üîΩyul dang dus la sogs pa gcod par @75a * //
analyzed: phyir ro // gzhan yang gal te thams cad du sgra sbyor ba med pa de lta na yang shes pa rtog pa med pa ma yin te / yul dang dus la sogs pa gcod par @75a * //
translated: Moreover, even if the application of sound is not everywhere, consciousness is not non-conceptual,

original: byed pa thams cad du snang ba'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /üîΩbam po dgu pa /
analyzed: byed pa thams cad du snang ba'i phyir ro / // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa / bam po dgu pa /
translated: because it is observed everywhere as that which cuts off objects, time, and so on.

original: yul la sogs pa dang bral ba'i dngos po ni nam yang rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: yul la sogs pa dang bral ba'i dngos po ni nam yang rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that a thing that is devoid of objects and so on is never cognized,

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: then in response to that we say the following:

original: gzhan du sems pa can gyis yang //
analyzed: gzhan du sems pa can gyis yang //
translated: A person who has a mind directed elsewhere

original: mig gis gzugs dag mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs dag mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: sees forms with his eyes.

original: de brda mi 'dzin de yi tshe //üîΩgsal ba'i des bskyed rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: de brda mi 'dzin de yi tshe // gsal ba'i des bskyed rtogs pa yin //
translated: At that time he does not apprehend the sign,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: but he does cognize the object that produces it.

original: gzhan du de yul gzhan la 'jug pa'i sems pa gang la yod pa'i skyes bu de yang mig gi rgyu mtshan gyis ba lang gi gzugs mdun na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du de yul gzhan la 'jug pa'i sems pa gang la yod pa'i skyes bu de yang mig gi rgyu mtshan gyis ba lang gi gzugs mdun na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: A person who has a mind directed elsewhere, that is, a mind engaged in another object, sees with his eyes the form of a cow that is present in front of him.

original: ba lang gi gzugs gsal ba ste snang bar gyur pa ba lang de la brda mi 'dzin pa nyid du gsal bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: ba lang gi gzugs gsal ba ste snang bar gyur pa ba lang de la brda mi 'dzin pa nyid du gsal bar shes par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that the form of the cow, which is clear and appears, is not the basis of the term.

original: rta'i yul la yang brda bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rta'i yul la yang brda bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the term is also applied to the object horse.

original: brda de las skyes pa ni rtog pa yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: brda de las skyes pa ni rtog pa yin par 'dod do //
translated: Imagination is asserted to arise from that term.

original: gal te yang shes pa thams cad brjod pa dang bcas pa nyid du skye ba de lta na ni rtar rtog pa'i dus su ba lang mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yang shes pa thams cad brjod pa dang bcas pa nyid du skye ba de lta na ni rtar rtog pa'i dus su ba lang mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If all consciousnesses arise with expression, then how could one see a cow at the time of imagining a horse?

original: rtog pa gnyis cig car skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis cig car skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Two imaginations do not arise simultaneously.

original: rta ru rtog pa'i tshe na ba lang gi rtog pa skye ba dmigs pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: rta ru rtog pa'i tshe na ba lang gi rtog pa skye ba dmigs pa ni ma yin la /
translated: When one imagines a horse, the imagination of a cow does not arise.

original: ba lang gi sgra yis gzhag pa'i nges pa ni ba lang mthong bde la yod pa ma yin zhing rtogs par gyur pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra yis gzhag pa'i nges pa ni ba lang mthong bde la yod pa ma yin zhing rtogs par gyur pa ma yin la /
translated: The ascertainment that is posited by the term cow does not exist for one who sees a cow and is not understood.

original: rtogs par gyur pa ma yin pa tsam gyis rtogs pa ni yod pa rtog nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par gyur pa ma yin pa tsam gyis rtogs pa ni yod pa rtog nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And that which is not understood cannot be imagined.

original: ba lang mthong ba na khams gsum thams cad rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang mthong ba na khams gsum thams cad rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that when one sees an ox one would understand all of the three realms.

original: de bas na ba lang mthong ba ni ming du btags pa las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ba lang mthong ba ni ming du btags pa las 'das pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, seeing an ox is beyond the realm of nominal designations.

original: gang yang gang gi tshe brda mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe ci yang rung ba'i spyi rtogs pa yod do zhes gang smras pa /
analyzed: gang yang gang gi tshe brda mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe ci yang rung ba'i spyi rtogs pa yod do zhes gang smras pa /
translated: As for what you said, namely, that ‚Äúwhen one does not apprehend a conventional symbol, there is an apprehension of a universal that is some thing or other,‚Äù

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not correct.

original: gal te ci yang rung ba'i spyi rtogs pa de la yod pa de lta na yang de'i khyad par de'i yul du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te ci yang rung ba'i spyi rtogs pa de la yod pa de lta na yang de'i khyad par de'i yul du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if there were an apprehension of a universal that is some thing or other, still, its particularities would not be its object,

original: de khyad par can du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de khyad par can du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not appear as having particularities.

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
translated: We have already explained that the nature of an appearance is the object of conceptual thought.

original: de bas na so sor nges pa'i khyad par can gyi rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra mi 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na so sor nges pa'i khyad par can gyi rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra mi 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it does not apprehend a word that expresses a particular that is determined in this way, it is not conceptual thought.

original: gang yang yul la sogs pa nges pa'i dngos po thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i shes pa @75b ma yin no zhes zer ba de yang mdzes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang yul la sogs pa nges pa'i dngos po thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i shes pa @75b ma yin no zhes zer ba de yang mdzes pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, it is not right to say that consciousness is not non-conceptual because it apprehends all things that are ascertained objects, etc.

original: 'di ltar rtsig pa la sogs pa mthong ban yul nye bar bsgribs pa gcod par byed par snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtsig pa la sogs pa mthong ban yul nye bar bsgribs pa gcod par byed par snang ba ma yin te /
translated: For example, when a wall, etc. is seen, it does not appear to cut off the object that is obstructed by the wall,

original: der rtsig pa la gnas pa'i brtan pa mthong nas rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: der rtsig pa la gnas pa'i brtan pa mthong nas rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: but one infers that it does so, having seen the wall that is stable and located there.

original: gang zhig yul snang ba de rtsig pa yongs su gcod ba ma yi na pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang zhig yul snang ba de rtsig pa yongs su gcod ba ma yi na pa'i phyir /
translated: And because the object that appears is not obstructed by the wall,

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid tsam kho na mngon sum du snang ga yongs su gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no //üîΩdus ni dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid tsam kho na mngon sum du snang ga yongs su gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no // dus ni dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir /
translated: it is only the mere intrinsic nature that appears directly, but it is not ascertained.

original: yongs su gcod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gcod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Time is not ascertained because it is beyond the senses.

original: sngon po'i rnam pa nyid las za dad pa'i dus snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam pa nyid las za dad pa'i dus snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The time that appears from the aspect of blue is not ascertained.

original: de bas na yongs su gcod pas dben par sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum yin par brjod kyi /
analyzed: de bas na yongs su gcod pas dben par sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum yin par brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, we say that the nature of blue, etc., is direct perception, because it is isolated from the act of positing.

original: gcad par bya ba dang gcod par byed pa'i dngos po ni rtog pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gcad par bya ba dang gcod par byed pa'i dngos po ni rtog pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: But the thing that is the object of the act of positing is taught by thought.

original: de'i phyir rtog pa gzhan yod kyang ba lang mthong ba las mngon sum rtog pa dang bral bar bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa gzhan yod kyang ba lang mthong ba las mngon sum rtog pa dang bral bar bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though another thought exists, the direct perception of the cow is established as free from thought.

original: gal te yang rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i dran grogs byed pa can gyi dbang pos rnag gi ngo bo snang bar byed na /
analyzed: gal te yang rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i dran grogs byed pa can gyi dbang pos rnag gi ngo bo snang bar byed na /
translated: If the sense faculty, which is assisted by the memory of the expressive sound, illuminates the nature of pus,

original: de lta na ni rta'i rtog pa yod na ba lang mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni rta'i rtog pa yod na ba lang mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then, when the thought of a horse exists, the cow would not be seen,

original: grogs byed pa'i rgyu med par rgyu rang gi 'bras bu la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: grogs byed pa'i rgyu med par rgyu rang gi 'bras bu la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because without a cause that assists it, the cause does not engage in its effect.

original: dper na sa bon sa la sogs pa dang bral na myu gu mi skyed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon sa la sogs pa dang bral na myu gu mi skyed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a seed does not produce a sprout without earth, etc.

original: 'on te shes pa thams cad kyi grogs byed pa ming gi dran pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa thams cad kyi grogs byed pa ming gi dran pa ma yin te /
translated: But if the memory of the name does not assist all consciousnesses,

original: 'on kyang ming gi khyad par can gyi don 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang ming gi khyad par can gyi don 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it does not apprehend the object that is distinguished by the name.

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not correct.

original: 'di ltar gal te dran pas grogs byed pa can gyi dbang po dang tha dad pa ni ming du snang ba can yin par byed cing gsal bar snang ba gzhan nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te dran pas grogs byed pa can gyi dbang po dang tha dad pa ni ming du snang ba can yin par byed cing gsal bar snang ba gzhan nyid yin la /
translated: If the appearance of a name is distinct from the sense faculty that is assisted by memory, then the appearance of a name is one thing and the appearance of clarity is another.

original: de'i tshe tha dad par rtog pa'i rtog pa dang lhan cig par mngon sum 'dod pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe tha dad par rtog pa'i rtog pa dang lhan cig par mngon sum 'dod pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: In that case, you assert that direct perception is accompanied by conception that conceives of difference.

original: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rtog pa yin par 'gegs pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rtog pa yin par 'gegs pa yin no //
translated: But you deny that the nature of direct perception is conception.

original: 'on te gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa can dang rtogs pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gcig nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa can dang rtogs pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gcig nyid yin gyi /
translated: Or, if the consciousness that apprehends the nature of clarity and is associated with conception is one,

original: mthong ba dang rtog pa tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba dang rtog pa tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then seeing and conception are not different.

original: de lta na 'o na ni padma mthong ba padma dri zhim po yin no snyam pa'i rtog pa skye bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni padma mthong ba padma dri zhim po yin no snyam pa'i rtog pa skye bar 'gyur la /
translated: In that case, when one sees a lotus, the conception that it is a fragrant lotus would arise.

original: de yang padma dri zhim por dran pa'i grogs can gyi mig gis padma'i gzugs gsal bar 'dzin par byed do zhes khas len par ci ste mi byed de /
analyzed: de yang padma dri zhim por dran pa'i grogs can gyi mig gis padma'i gzugs gsal bar 'dzin par byed do zhes khas len par ci ste mi byed de /
translated: Why not accept that the eye, assisted by the recollection of the sweet scent of the lotus, clearly apprehends the form of the lotus?

original: mig ni @76a * //
analyzed: mig ni @76a * //
translated: The eye

original: dri dran pa'i grogs byed pa can padma'i dri la 'jug pa la skyon ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dri dran pa'i grogs byed pa can padma'i dri la 'jug pa la skyon ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not assisted by the recollection of the scent, but there is no fault in the eye engaging the scent of the lotus.

original: 'on te dran pa yod kyang mig dri la 'jug pa ma yin te yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dran pa yod kyang mig dri la 'jug pa ma yin te yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But even if recollection exists, the eye does not engage the scent because it is not the object.

original: de ltan yang yul ma yin pa'i phyir dran pa yod kyang sgra la mig mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltan yang yul ma yin pa'i phyir dran pa yod kyang sgra la mig mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: In that case, because sound is not the object, the eye does not engage sound even if recollection exists.

original: sgra la sogs pa dang bral bar mig gi shes pas don 'dzin pa can no //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa dang bral bar mig gi shes pas don 'dzin pa can no //
translated: Therefore the object of the eye consciousness is free from sound and so on.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang // gang la sgra ni nges 'god pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang // gang la sgra ni nges 'god pa //
translated: When a sound is definitely applied to something,

original: de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur //
translated: a conception arises.

original: des na dbang skyes 'dod pa las //
analyzed: des na dbang skyes 'dod pa las //
translated: Therefore, in desire, the eye engages its object

original: 'jug 'gyur phyi rol mthong ma yin //
analyzed: 'jug 'gyur phyi rol mthong ma yin //
translated: because of the eye faculty, not because of seeing external objects.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i don gang zhig la sgra nges par 'god pa'i yul de la rtog pa brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i don gang zhig la sgra nges par 'god pa'i yul de la rtog pa brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: The object that is the referent of a word is a hidden object, and the cognition that is the referent of a word is a cognition that is the referent of a word.

original: de lta na yul gzhan la sgra 'god pa dang don gzhan la rtog pa skye bar 'gyur na sgra'i khyad par can gyi don snang ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yul gzhan la sgra 'god pa dang don gzhan la rtog pa skye bar 'gyur na sgra'i khyad par can gyi don snang ba can ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the word is applied to one object, but the cognition arises with regard to another object. The cognition does not appear to have the word as its object.

original: sgra'i yul can gyi blo 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa can yin pa de bas na mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na dbang po'i shes pa 'dod pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa ste sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra'i yul can gyi blo 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa can yin pa de bas na mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na dbang po'i shes pa 'dod pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa ste sgra bzhin no //
translated: The cognition that has a word as its object is a cognition that is governed by desire. Therefore, if perception were conceptual, then like a word, a sense consciousness would engage its object by the power of desire.

original: phyi rol gyi don la yang ltos pa ma yin te sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la yang ltos pa ma yin te sgra bzhin no //
translated: It would not depend on an external object, like a word.

original: sgra dang sgra las skyes pa'i shes pa phyi rol mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang sgra las skyes pa'i shes pa phyi rol mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because a word and the cognition that arises from a word do not see external objects.

original: 'on te don yod pa nyid la sgra 'god pa de'i phyi rol la ltos pa can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don yod pa nyid la sgra 'god pa de'i phyi rol la ltos pa can yin no zhe na /
translated: But if a word is applied to an existent object, then it is dependent on an external object.

original: de lta na ni ji ltar 'dod pas sgra'i shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa'i rtogs pa yang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa can yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni ji ltar 'dod pas sgra'i shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa'i rtogs pa yang 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa can yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, just as the cognition of sound occurs in accordance with desire, so too the cognition born from the sense faculty would be without an object, because it would follow after desire.

original: 'on te 'dod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug pa can te /
analyzed: 'on te 'dod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug pa can te /
translated: But if it does not follow after desire,

original: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don la ltos pa can dbang po'i shes pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don la ltos pa can dbang po'i shes pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'o zhe na /
translated: then the sense consciousness that depends on an external object has an object.

original: gal te de lta na phyi rol gyi rjes su 'gro ba can mngon sum ni nye ba tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te de lta na phyi rol gyi rjes su 'gro ba can mngon sum ni nye ba tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If that is so, then direct perception, which follows after the external object, would be non-conceptual, because it grasps only what is near.

original: sgra yis gzhag pa ni 'dod pa la rag las pa'i phyir dbang po las skyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra yis gzhag pa ni 'dod pa la rag las pa'i phyir dbang po las skyes pa ma yin no //
translated: But the establishment by sound is not born from the sense faculty, because it depends on desire.

original: 'o na gal te mngon sum sgra yis gzhag pa las 'das pa yin na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te mngon sum sgra yis gzhag pa las 'das pa yin na /
translated: But if direct perception transcends being established by sound,

original: de lta na ni mngon sum gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid gcod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni mngon sum gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid gcod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then in that case, direct perception would have the nature of clarity and would be itself a valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar gsal ba ni sgra'i ngo bo nyid can rtag pa yin la sgra de nub par gyur na gsal ba ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal ba ni sgra'i ngo bo nyid can rtag pa yin la sgra de nub par gyur na gsal ba ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the manifestation is permanent, having the nature of sound, because when that sound disappears, the manifestation is not seen.

original: sgra'i ngo bo nyid gal te mngon sum ma yin na de'i ngo @76b bo nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgra'i ngo bo nyid gal te mngon sum ma yin na de'i ngo @76b bo nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: If the nature of sound is not directly perceived, then what is its nature?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: gzugs ni gzugs zhes mthong na ni //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs zhes mthong na ni //
translated: If form is seen as ‚Äúform,‚Äù

original: de yis blo zhes ji ltar mthong //
analyzed: de yis blo zhes ji ltar mthong //
translated: how is it seen as the cognition of that?

original: de yi nyams myong yod na yang //
analyzed: de yi nyams myong yod na yang //
translated: Even if there is an experience of that,

original: de ni ji ltar rtog med 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar rtog med 'gyur //
translated: how could it be non-conceptual?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: sgra'i ngo bo nyid nub par gyur kyang gsal ba'i dngos po yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i ngo bo nyid nub par gyur kyang gsal ba'i dngos po yin te /
translated: Even when the nature of sound disappears, it is the entity of the manifestation,

original: gang gi phyir skye po gzhan du son pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i skye bo la gzugs gsal bar snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di dag ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skye po gzhan du son pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i skye bo la gzugs gsal bar snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di dag ni bstan zin to //
translated: because there is the appearance of form to a person whose mind has gone elsewhere. This has already been explained.

original: gzhan yang shes pa thams cad rtog pa dang bcas par smras bas /
analyzed: gzhan yang shes pa thams cad rtog pa dang bcas par smras bas /
translated: Moreover, since it is said that all consciousnesses have concepts,

original: gzugs so snyam pa'i rtog pas gzugs mthong ba yin yang /
analyzed: gzugs so snyam pa'i rtog pas gzugs mthong ba yin yang /
translated: form is seen by the concept of ‚Äúform.‚Äù

original: gzugs de'i blo yin par ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzugs de'i blo yin par ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: How could it be seen that the cognition is the form?

original: gzugs mthong ngo snyam pa'i rtog pa gzugs nges pa'i dus de na de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs mthong ngo snyam pa'i rtog pa gzugs nges pa'i dus de na de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at the time of the conception ‚ÄúI see form,‚Äù the form does not exist.

original: 'on te gzugs nyid shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te gzugs nyid shes pa yin gyi /
translated: But if form itself is cognition,

original: gzugs su snang ba shes pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs su snang ba shes pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not cognition appearing as form.

original: 'o na gzugs kyi blo de'i nyams su myong ba yod de /
analyzed: 'o na gzugs kyi blo de'i nyams su myong ba yod de /
translated: Well then, there is the experience of the cognition of form.

original: blo myong ba med na nyams su myong bar gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid shes pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: blo myong ba med na nyams su myong bar gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid shes pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: If there were no experience of cognition, there would be no cognition of the essence of that which is experienced.

original: gzugs nyams su myong ba mngon du byed pa med par don nyams su myong ba nyid rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs nyams su myong ba mngon du byed pa med par don nyams su myong ba nyid rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because without the experience of form, the experience of the object is not cognized.

original: gzhan yang 'gro ba bzang mo mthong ba'i tshe bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'gro ba bzang mo mthong ba'i tshe bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Moreover, when one sees a beautiful woman, one experiences pleasure,

original: bde ba'o snyam du rtog pa skye ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba'o snyam du rtog pa skye ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but the conception ‚ÄúThis is pleasure‚Äù does not arise.

original: blo'i nyams su myong ba ni rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: blo'i nyams su myong ba ni rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The experience of cognition is nonconceptual.

original: 'on te rtog pa med na blo nyams su myong ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rtog pa med na blo nyams su myong ba yin zhe na /
translated: But if it is not a conception, then it is an experience of the mind.

original: 'o na gal te rig pa thams cad rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na ni /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rig pa thams cad rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na ni /
translated: If all cognitions are accompanied by conceptions,

original: blo'i nyams su myong ba de nges pa med par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: blo'i nyams su myong ba de nges pa med par ji ltar 'gyur /
