original: sgra yis nye bar gzhag pa las skyes pa'i shes pa la phul du byung ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra yis nye bar gzhag pa las skyes pa'i shes pa la phul du byung ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since memory is not the cause of the apprehension of the object, it is not the cause of the apprehension of the object

original: de la nye bar 'jog pas dgos pa ci zhig yod ;
analyzed: de la nye bar 'jog pas dgos pa ci zhig yod ;
translated: What is the purpose of closely placing the mind?

original: 'on te nye bar 'jog pa yod na gzugs la sogs pa la 'jug par nges te /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar 'jog pa yod na gzugs la sogs pa la 'jug par nges te /
translated: But if there is close placement, then it is certain that the mind engages form and so on,

original: de dang 'di'i zhes bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis sgrub pa la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dang 'di'i zhes bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis sgrub pa la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because it is said that ‚Äúthis‚Äù engages the attainment of pleasure and pain.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: nye bar 'jog pa med kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar 'jog pa med kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because engagement occurs even without close placement.

original: rtog pa med pa las kyang sngar goms pa'i stobs @81b kyis 'jug par mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa las kyang sngar goms pa'i stobs @81b kyis 'jug par mthong ba yin te /
translated: And it is seen that engagement occurs from non-imagination through the power of prior habituation,

original: 'di ltar rta'i rtog pa ni ba lang mthong ba nyid las kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rta'i rtog pa ni ba lang mthong ba nyid las kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the imagination of a horse occurs from seeing a cow.

original: de bas na 'jug par 'gyur ba la yang nges pa'i byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'jug par 'gyur ba la yang nges pa'i byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even in engagement, there is no definite cause.

original: 'o na gal te goms pas mthong ba nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te goms pas mthong ba nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if engagement occurs through habituation,

original: de lta na ni ming la sogs pa dran pa med par yang dang po'i dus su 'jug par mi 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni ming la sogs pa dran pa med par yang dang po'i dus su 'jug par mi 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: then it would not occur in the beginning without the memory of names and so on.

original: de bas na dang po 'jug pa'i don du 'jug pa la dran pa yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na dang po 'jug pa'i don du 'jug pa la dran pa yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, first of all, in order to engage in the object, there is memory.

original: 'di la smras pa /
analyzed: 'di la smras pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: gsal ba'i rna pa can gyi tha dad pa brdar btags pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba'i rna pa can gyi tha dad pa brdar btags pa med pa ste /
translated: The difference of the manifest is not a conventional symbol,

original: sgra yis ma sbyar ba nyid kyis gzung bar bya ba tha dad pa de la dran pa gzhan ci'i phyir byed de don med pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra yis ma sbyar ba nyid kyis gzung bar bya ba tha dad pa de la dran pa gzhan ci'i phyir byed de don med pa yin no //
translated: because it is not apprehended by means of a word. Why would memory be different? It would be meaningless.

original: ji ltar brdar btags pa ni tha snyad 'grub par bya ba'i don du brda dran par 'dod de /
analyzed: ji ltar brdar btags pa ni tha snyad 'grub par bya ba'i don du brda dran par 'dod de /
translated: As for the conventional symbol, it is desired to be remembered for the sake of establishing the convention,

original: tha dad pa sgra yis khyad par 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa sgra yis khyad par 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not the apprehension of the difference by means of a word.

original: gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa la ming la sogs pa dran pa la dgos pa dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa la ming la sogs pa dran pa la dgos pa dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The realization of the nature of the manifest does not have the purpose of remembering the name, etc.

original: dang por 'jug pa ni rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dang por 'jug pa ni rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the first engagement is from inference,

original: gzugs mthong ba la sgra'i nye bar 'jog pa'i byed pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gzugs mthong ba la sgra'i nye bar 'jog pa'i byed pa ma yin zhing /
translated: the seeing of form is not the function of the placement of the word,

original: 'jug pa la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa la yang ma yin no //
translated: nor is it of the engagement.

original: sgra'i don la goms pa ni don med pa nyid yin yang rtog pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra'i don la goms pa ni don med pa nyid yin yang rtog pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the meaning of the word is meaningless, the conceptual consciousness does engage it.

original: 'o na dbang po'i shes pa la snang ba ni spyi nyid yin te ;
analyzed: 'o na dbang po'i shes pa la snang ba ni spyi nyid yin te ;
translated: But the appearance to a sense consciousness is a universal,

original: sngar mthong ba'i tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na //
translated: not the individual that was seen before.

original: spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni //
analyzed: spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni //
translated: If it apprehends a mere universal,

original: khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo //üîΩde bas mig dang gzugs dag la //
analyzed: khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo // de bas mig dang gzugs dag la //
translated: it cannot depend on a particular.üîΩTherefore, the visual consciousness arises

original: brten nas mig gi blo skyer 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: brten nas mig gi blo skyer 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: in dependence on the eye and form.

original: mngon sum gyis khyad par dang bral ba'i spyi tsam zhig 'dzin pa yin na ni khyad par du snang ba 'dod pa thob par mi 'gyur ba las khyad par 'dod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis khyad par dang bral ba'i spyi tsam zhig 'dzin pa yin na ni khyad par du snang ba 'dod pa thob par mi 'gyur ba las khyad par 'dod pa yang yin te /
translated: If a sense consciousness apprehends a mere universal that is devoid of a particular, then it would not be possible to desire a particular, even though one desires the appearance of a particular.

original: 'di ltar shing zhes bya ba'i spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na yang shing ji lta bu yin zhes tshar pa la sogs pa 'dod par snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar shing zhes bya ba'i spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na yang shing ji lta bu yin zhes tshar pa la sogs pa 'dod par snang ba'i phyir /
translated: This is because, although one apprehends a mere universal called ‚Äútree,‚Äù one desires a particular, such as ‚Äúan oak tree.‚Äù

original: snga phyi dran pa ma rtogs par spyi 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin zhing rjod par byed pa'i sgra dran pa ni mthong ba la byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snga phyi dran pa ma rtogs par spyi 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin zhing rjod par byed pa'i sgra dran pa ni mthong ba la byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the memory of the prior and subsequent, there is no apprehension of the universal, and the memory of the word that expresses it is not present in the seeing.

original: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi blo skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi blo skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the visual cognition arises in dependence on the eye and form.

original: 'di ltar phyi rol na gnas pa'i gzugs tsam la mig 'jug pa mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyi rol na gnas pa'i gzugs tsam la mig 'jug pa mthong ba yin na /
translated: In this way, the eye is seen to engage only in the form that exists externally.

original: ji ltar sgra dang spyi'i yul can du 'gyur /üîΩde bas na dran pa'i sngar phyis mig gi rig pas snga ma dang phyi ma @82a * //
analyzed: ji ltar sgra dang spyi'i yul can du 'gyur / de bas na dran pa'i sngar phyis mig gi rig pas snga ma dang phyi ma @82a * //
translated: How can it have sound and a universal for its object?

original: 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the prior and subsequent are not apprehended by the visual cognition that is prior to and subsequent to the memory.

original: rtog pa med pa ni nye ba tsam zhig snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa ni nye ba tsam zhig snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nonconceptual cognition is one that appears merely through proximity.

original: sgra yis nye bar gzhag pa ni brda dran pas blang bar bya ba'i skye ba can yin pa'i snga ma dang phyi ma la rtog pa can gyi yid nyid yin no //
analyzed: sgra yis nye bar gzhag pa ni brda dran pas blang bar bya ba'i skye ba can yin pa'i snga ma dang phyi ma la rtog pa can gyi yid nyid yin no //
translated: The one that is posited by the word is the mind that is conceptual with regard to the prior and subsequent, and it is one that is to be taken up through the memory of the sign.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum rtog pa dang bral bar grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum rtog pa dang bral bar grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, perception is established as being free from conceptual thought.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir gnyis la rag las nas skye ba dbang po la brten par brjod kyi yul la brten par ma yin no zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi gzhung 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir gnyis la rag las nas skye ba dbang po la brten par brjod kyi yul la brten par ma yin no zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi gzhung 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this passage of the master is as follows:

original: mig la rag las pa dang yul la rag las pa nas mngon sum skye ba yin na /
analyzed: mig la rag las pa dang yul la rag las pa nas mngon sum skye ba yin na /
translated: If direct perception arises in dependence on the eye and in dependence on the object,

original: ci'i phyir dbang po la brten pa zhes bya'i /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dbang po la brten pa zhes bya'i /
translated: why is it called based on the sense faculty?

original: yul la brten pa zhes mi bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yul la brten pa zhes mi bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the meaning of the passage that it should be called based on the object.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi sgo nas kyang brjod par rigs kyi dbang po 'ba' zhig las ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi sgo nas kyang brjod par rigs kyi dbang po 'ba' zhig las ma yin te /
translated: It is also correct to say that it is based on the object such as form, but not that it is based on the sense faculty alone,

original: dbang po las skyes pa kho nas mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa kho nas mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: because it is not direct perception merely by arising from the sense faculty,

original: rab rib kyis bcom pa'i mig las skyes pas zla ba gnyis su mthong ba mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab rib kyis bcom pa'i mig las skyes pas zla ba gnyis su mthong ba mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because seeing two moons arising from eyes impaired by ophthalmia is not direct perception.

original: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi mthong ba la 'jug pa ni thams cad mngon sum kho na yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi mthong ba la 'jug pa ni thams cad mngon sum kho na yin pa de bas na /
translated: But all that engages in seeing that has the aspect of the object is direct perception.

original: yul la mi 'khrul ba can ni mngon sum yin la /
analyzed: yul la mi 'khrul ba can ni mngon sum yin la /
translated: A cognition is nonerroneous with respect to its object when it is a direct percept.

original: brjod pa yang 'khrul pa med par rigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa yang 'khrul pa med par rigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is reasonable that the expression of that cognition is nonerroneous.

original: 'o na yul gyi phan btags pa'i zla ba gnyis su snang ba 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na yul gyi phan btags pa'i zla ba gnyis su snang ba 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the appearance of two moons due to the influence of an object an error?

original: de'i phyir yul gyi stobs kyis bskyed pa yin na yang thams cad phyin ci ma log pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul gyi stobs kyis bskyed pa yin na yang thams cad phyin ci ma log pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though it is produced by the power of an object, it is not nonerroneous.

original: 'on te zla ba ni zla ba gnyis su snang ba'i shes pa'i yul ma yin te shes pa la dran pa 'jog par nus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te zla ba ni zla ba gnyis su snang ba'i shes pa'i yul ma yin te shes pa la dran pa 'jog par nus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: But the moon is not the object of the cognition that appears as two moons, because it is not capable of being recalled in that cognition.

original: de yul ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yul ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not its object.

original: de lta na 'o na ni phyin ci log tu snang ba'i rgyu dbang po nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni phyin ci log tu snang ba'i rgyu dbang po nyid ma yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the sense faculty itself is not the cause of the appearance of error,

original: rnam pa rab rib kyis bcom pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa rab rib kyis bcom pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the cause of the aspect that is destroyed by cataracts.

original: nye bar bcom pa'i dbang po ni dbang po ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar bcom pa'i dbang po ni dbang po ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: A sense faculty that is destroyed is a semblance of a sense faculty.

original: de lta bas na mig dang yul dag mtshungs pa yin na brtsad par rigs te /
analyzed: de lta bas na mig dang yul dag mtshungs pa yin na brtsad par rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to debate whether the eye and the object are similar.

original: yul yang dbang po bzhin mngon sum ;
analyzed: yul yang dbang po bzhin mngon sum ;
translated: The object is like the sense faculty, a direct percept.

original: / shes pa skyed par nus na ni //
analyzed: / shes pa skyed par nus na ni //
translated: If it has the ability to generate consciousness,

original: 'o na ci'i phyir gnyis ltos pa'i //üîΩskye ba de ni des mi brjod //
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir gnyis ltos pa'i // skye ba de ni des mi brjod //
translated: then why is the arising that depends on both

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: not described as that?

original: 'o na gal te mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed pa la yul la nus pa mngon du yod de dbang po bzhin yin na ni /
analyzed: 'o na gal te mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed pa la yul la nus pa mngon du yod de dbang po bzhin yin na ni /
translated: Here, if the object has the ability to generate a direct perceptual consciousness, like the sense faculty,

original: de lta na ni dbang po dang yul gnyis la rag las nas mngon sum @82b skye ba de ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni dbang po dang yul gnyis la rag las nas mngon sum @82b skye ba de ni /
translated: then why is the arising of direct perception that depends on both the sense faculty and the objectüîΩnot described as that, as arising in dependence on the object from the perspective of the object?

original: yul de'i sgo nas yul la brten pa'o zhes ci'i phyir mi brjod ce na 'dir smras pa /üîΩrtogs par byed pa nyid dpyad nas //
analyzed: yul de'i sgo nas yul la brten pa'o zhes ci'i phyir mi brjod ce na 'dir smras pa / rtogs par byed pa nyid dpyad nas //
translated: Here, in response, it is said:üîΩHaving analyzed the very thing that causes understanding,

original: tha snyad nges par sbyor bar byed //
analyzed: tha snyad nges par sbyor bar byed //
translated: the convention is applied.

original: da yang dbang po'i ming la yod /
analyzed: da yang dbang po'i ming la yod /
translated: The name of the sense faculty exists,

original: de yi chos kyang nges sbyor yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la /üîΩtha snyad thams cad ni brjod par 'dod pa'i dngos po ston pa na /
analyzed: de yi chos kyang nges sbyor yin // zhes bya ba la / tha snyad thams cad ni brjod par 'dod pa'i dngos po ston pa na /
translated: and its quality is also applied.

original: rtogs par byed pa dpyad nas sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa dpyad nas sbyor bar byed de /
translated: Here, all conventions are applied having analyzed the very thing that causes understanding when the thing that is the object of expression is indicated.

original: gang la go bar byed pa med pa'i sgra de ni sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la go bar byed pa med pa'i sgra de ni sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: A sound that does not cause one to understand is not a means of knowledge.

original: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo go bar byed pa yang dbang po la brten pa'i ming gis nus pa ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo go bar byed pa yang dbang po la brten pa'i ming gis nus pa ste /
translated: The nature of perception is to cause one to understand, and it is based on the senses.

original: gang dbang po la brten pa de mngon sum yin la /
analyzed: gang dbang po la brten pa de mngon sum yin la /
translated: That which is based on the senses is perception.

original: nye bar bcom pa'i dbang pos ma nges pa ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar bcom pa'i dbang pos ma nges pa ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: The object that is destroyed in the present moment is the object of perception.

original: rtogs par byed pa de'i chos kyang nges par sbyar bar 'os pa yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa de'i chos kyang nges par sbyar bar 'os pa yin te /
translated: The property of that which causes one to understand is also suitable to be applied to the object.

original: des na dbang po'i sgo nas mngon sum zhes bya bas brdar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: des na dbang po'i sgo nas mngon sum zhes bya bas brdar btags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is figuratively called perception based on the senses.

original: 'on te yul dang lhan cig 'khrul pa med de /
analyzed: 'on te yul dang lhan cig 'khrul pa med de /
translated: But if it is not mistaken with regard to the object,

original: zla ba ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: zla ba ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: then the moon is not the object of a mistaken consciousness.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gal te zla ba yul ma yin na skyes bu gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi yul du 'di ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te zla ba yul ma yin na skyes bu gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi yul du 'di ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the moon is not the object, how can it be the object of perception for another person?

original: dbang po las skyes pa nyid ni dbang po gcig yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa nyid ni dbang po gcig yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir /
translated: That which arises from the sense faculty is related to the presence or absence of the sense faculty.üîΩ

original: dbang po'i ni thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po'i ni thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That which is born from the sense faculty is the uncommon cause of the sense faculty because it is related to the presence or absence of the sense faculty.

original: tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi ;
analyzed: tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi ;
translated: It is the reason for the designation of the sense faculty,

original: yul ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yul ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not the object,

original: de ni skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is common to all beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nas kyi myu gu zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i tha snyad du snang ba yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nas kyi myu gu zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i tha snyad du snang ba yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no /
translated: Therefore it is said that the appearance of the uncommon designation ‚Äúthe sprout of barley‚Äù is the object.

original: 'on te yul la brten pa zhes bya ba yul gyi bdag nyid can shes pa yin par 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yul la brten pa zhes bya ba yul gyi bdag nyid can shes pa yin par 'dod do zhe na /
translated: But if you assert that consciousness is supported on the object, that is, that it has the nature of the object,

original: de lta na ni rang rig pa nyid mngon sum du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de lta na ni rang rig pa nyid mngon sum du 'gyur gyi /
translated: then it would be reflexive awareness that is direct perception,

original: dbang po las skyes pa ni go bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa ni go bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but that which is born from the sense faculty would not be the object of direct perception.

original: 'on te 'jig rten la grags pas yul 'dzin par brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten la grags pas yul 'dzin par brjod do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the object is described as being apprehended because it is known in the world,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: mngon sum zhes bya ba nyid 'jig rten la grags pas 'di nyid kyis chog mod /
analyzed: mngon sum zhes bya ba nyid 'jig rten la grags pas 'di nyid kyis chog mod /
translated: The term ‚Äúperception‚Äù is well known in the world, and it is sufficient to use that term.

original: brjod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya ;
analyzed: brjod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya ;
translated: What is the use of other expressions?

original: bye brag tu smra ba'i lta ba la yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon sum du 'gyur te yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba'i lta ba la yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon sum du 'gyur te yul 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika view, mental consciousness is also perception, because it apprehends objects.

original: de ltar yang yul ni thun mong ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang yul ni thun mong ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, the object is common,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang gzhan gyi rgyu la yod pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang gzhan gyi rgyu la yod pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of mental consciousness and the cause of consciousness that exists in another‚Äôs continuum.

original: de bas na dbang po'i sgra yis brjod pas mngon @83a * //
analyzed: de bas na dbang po'i sgra yis brjod pas mngon @83a * //
translated: Therefore, the term ‚Äúsense faculty‚Äù is used to express perception,

original: sum ni rtog pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid du mtshon par nus kyi /
analyzed: sum ni rtog pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid du mtshon par nus kyi /
translated: and it is possible to indicate that perception is by nature free from conceptualization.

original: yul gyi sgra yis brjod pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi sgra yis brjod pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not possible to indicate that by using the term ‚Äúobject.‚Äù

original: 'on te yul brjod pas kyang rtog pa dang bral bar ston par nus te /
analyzed: 'on te yul brjod pas kyang rtog pa dang bral bar ston par nus te /
translated: But if the object is expressed, it is possible to indicate that it is free from conceptualization,

original: 'di ltar don gyi stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar don gyi stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it arises by the power of the object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: zla ba gnyis snang ba na don las skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis snang ba na don las skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when there is an appearance of two moons, there is no arising from an object.

original: des na de rtog pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de rtog pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not non-conceptual.

original: 'on te don gyi stobs kyis skyes pa phyin ci log gi shes pa la med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don gyi stobs kyis skyes pa phyin ci log gi shes pa la med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that what arises by the power of an object does not exist in a mistaken consciousness,

original: de lta na 'o na mngon sum thams cad don las skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na mngon sum thams cad don las skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: then in that case, since all direct perceptions arise from an object,

original: rtog pa med pa nyid du brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa nyid du brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not possible to say that they are non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir dbang po nyams pa la skyes pas thams cad rtog pa med par grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po nyams pa la skyes pas thams cad rtog pa med par grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since it would follow that everything is established as non-conceptual because of arising from impaired faculties,

original: dbang po nyid kyi sgra yis tha snyad gdags par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyi sgra yis tha snyad gdags par rigs pa yin no //
translated: it is reasonable to designate the faculties themselves as non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad 'di la ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad 'di la ni //
translated: Therefore, in this convention,

original: rang bzhin gyis rtags nges par sbyar //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rtags nges par sbyar //
translated: the natural evidence is definitely applied.

original: ngo bo khyab par byed pa ni //
analyzed: ngo bo khyab par byed pa ni //
translated: The essence that is the pervader

original: log pa'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: log pa'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur //
translated: is reversed, and therefore it is reversed.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: gang gi phyir rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams kyis rtogs par byed pa dpyad nas tha snyad sbyor bar byed pa de'i phyir mngon sum gyi tha snyad 'di la ni rtags nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams kyis rtogs par byed pa dpyad nas tha snyad sbyor bar byed pa de'i phyir mngon sum gyi tha snyad 'di la ni rtags nges par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Because those who employ concepts first analyze and then apply conventions, therefore, in this case of the convention of perception, a reason must be applied.

original: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid la ltos nas go bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid la ltos nas go bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: In dependence on the nature of perception itself, it is the nature of what is to be understood.

original: des na rtogs par byed pa la rtags sbyor ba yin no //üîΩnges par sbyor ba de yang yul brten pa'i sgra la ldog pa yin te /
analyzed: des na rtogs par byed pa la rtags sbyor ba yin no // nges par sbyor ba de yang yul brten pa'i sgra la ldog pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, a reason is applied to what is to be understood.

original: khyab par byad pa'i rang bzhin go bar byed pa ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par byad pa'i rang bzhin go bar byed pa ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, that application is based on the object, because the nature of the pervader is understood.

original: des na dbang po la brten pa nyid kyis mngon sum zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gdags par rigs so //
analyzed: des na dbang po la brten pa nyid kyis mngon sum zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gdags par rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to impute the convention ‚Äúperception‚Äù by the mere dependence on the sense faculties.

original: de bas na mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is established that perception is free from conceptuality.

original: 'o na gal te mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin na /
translated: Now, if perception is without conceptuality,

original: 'o na gang 'di slob dpon snga mas rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs ni bsags pa la dmigs pa can no zhes gsungs pa dang / der ni du ma'i don skyed phyir //
analyzed: 'o na gang 'di slob dpon snga mas rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs ni bsags pa la dmigs pa can no zhes gsungs pa dang / der ni du ma'i don skyed phyir //
translated: Well then, it would contradict the statement by the former master that the five collections of consciousness have as their object that which is accumulated, and the statement:üîΩBecause it generates the meaning of many,

original: rang gi don la spyi'i yul can //üîΩzhes gsungs pa de dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /üîΩ'das pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi don la spyi'i yul can // zhes gsungs pa de dang 'gal bar 'gyur te / 'das pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa ma yin te /
translated: the sense faculty consciousness has a universal as its object.üîΩThis is because a consciousness that observes the past is not a conception.

original: bsags pa rtogs pa ni rtog pa med par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsags pa rtogs pa ni rtog pa med par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is contradictory that the realization of that which is accumulated is non-conceptual.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / bsags pa dag ni tshogs pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bsags pa dag ni tshogs pa yin //
translated: Accumulations are collections.

original: de spyi de la dbang po'i blo //üîΩspyi blo gdon mi za bar yang //
analyzed: de spyi de la dbang po'i blo // spyi blo gdon mi za bar yang //
translated: The sense consciousness of that universalüîΩis definitely concomitant with

original: rnam par rtog pa dang rjes 'brel //üîΩ@83b zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang rjes 'brel // @83b zhes bya ba la /
translated: conception.

original: rdul phra rab rnams mang po bsags pa ni tshogs par brjod de /
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams mang po bsags pa ni tshogs par brjod de /
translated: Here, many atoms are called an accumulation.

original: tshogs pa de yang spyi yin te kun rdzob tu yod pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa de yang spyi yin te kun rdzob tu yod pa'o //
translated: That accumulation is a universal, and it exists conventionally.

original: rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i lus can tha dad par snang ba la 'dus pa'i blo yod pa ma yin pa de bas na tha dad pa'i tshogs pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i lus can tha dad par snang ba la 'dus pa'i blo yod pa ma yin pa de bas na tha dad pa'i tshogs pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of an aggregation does not exist for the atoms, which are mutually different, since they appear as different. Therefore, an aggregation of different things does not exist.

original: 'on te rdul phra rab las tha dad pa tshogs pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rdul phra rab las tha dad pa tshogs pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that the aggregation is different from the atoms,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rdul phra rab kyis dben par tshogs pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyis dben par tshogs pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: An aggregation is not perceived as being devoid of atoms.

original: rdul phra rab rnams las log pa'i 'dus pa 'dzin na ni tha mi dad pa nyid du 'dzin pas 'dus pa ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams las log pa'i 'dus pa 'dzin na ni tha mi dad pa nyid du 'dzin pas 'dus pa ni ci zhig yin /
translated: If you grasp an aggregation as being different from the atoms, you grasp it as being non-different. What is an aggregation?

original: 'on te rdul phra rab rnams bdag gi ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba ma yin te /üîΩ'on kyang rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba de 'dus pa'i sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rdul phra rab rnams bdag gi ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba ma yin te / 'on kyang rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba de 'dus pa'i sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the atoms do not appear as having the nature of being one‚Äôs own,üîΩbut the cognition of the form of an aggregation of atoms arises, and that is the proof of the aggregation,

original: 'dus pa rtogs pa'i sgro btags pa tsam ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa rtogs pa'i sgro btags pa tsam ste /
translated: that is a mere superimposition of the understanding of an aggregation.

original: nags la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nags la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like a forest, etc.

original: spyi yang rdul phra rab thams cad kyi thun mong ba 'dzin pa'i blo ni rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: spyi yang rdul phra rab thams cad kyi thun mong ba 'dzin pa'i blo ni rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'o //
translated: The universal is the cognition that apprehends the commonality of all atoms.

original: de bas na mig la sogs pa'i blo rnams spyi 'dzin pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid rnyed par dka' ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na mig la sogs pa'i blo rnams spyi 'dzin pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid rnyed par dka' ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Therefore, is it not difficult to establish that the cognitions of the eye, etc. are non-conceptual, since they apprehend universals?üîΩWe reply:

original: smras pa // don gzhan dang ni mngon 'brel phyir //
analyzed: smras pa // don gzhan dang ni mngon 'brel phyir //
translated: Because it is connected with the manifestation of another object,

original: rdul phran gzhan gang skyes 'gyur ba //üîΩde dag bsags bshad de yang ni //
analyzed: rdul phran gzhan gang skyes 'gyur ba // de dag bsags bshad de yang ni //
translated: the other atom that is producedüîΩis said to be an aggregation.

original: shes pa skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin //
analyzed: shes pa skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin //
translated: And that is the objective condition of the arising of cognition.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: rdul phra rab las tha dad pa'i don gzhan nye bar 'jog pa'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab las tha dad pa'i don gzhan nye bar 'jog pa'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is connected with the cause of positing another object that is different from the atom,

original: sngar gyi rdul phra rab rnams las gzhan pa'i rdul phra rab gang zhig rung ba'i yul na gnas pa shes pa'i rgyur skyes pa'i rdul phra rab de nyid la bsags pa zhes bsags pa la dmigs pa can zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bshad kyi /
analyzed: sngar gyi rdul phra rab rnams las gzhan pa'i rdul phra rab gang zhig rung ba'i yul na gnas pa shes pa'i rgyur skyes pa'i rdul phra rab de nyid la bsags pa zhes bsags pa la dmigs pa can zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bshad kyi /
translated: The text explains that the cause of the cognition of a particular atom is the atom itself, which is located in a particular place and is different from the other atoms.

original: gzhan pa'i bsags pa ni yod pa ma yin no //üîΩgang gi phyir rdul phra rab khyad par can du skyes pa de nyid mngon sum gyi shes pa skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i bsags pa ni yod pa ma yin no // gang gi phyir rdul phra rab khyad par can du skyes pa de nyid mngon sum gyi shes pa skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The text does not say that the cause of the cognition is a collection of atoms.üîΩThe cause of the cognition is the atom itself, which is different from the other atoms.

original: 'o na gal te rdul phra rab nyid phan tshun tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin pa de lta na ;
analyzed: 'o na gal te rdul phra rab nyid phan tshun tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin pa de lta na ;
translated: If the atoms are the cause of the cognition of a single atom,

original: 'o na ni snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the atoms should be perceived as separate.

original: skra shad la sogs pa ma 'dres pa yang ring po nas ma 'dres par mi snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: skra shad la sogs pa ma 'dres pa yang ring po nas ma 'dres par mi snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: But the hairs and so on that are not mixed are not perceived as separate from a distance.

original: de bzhin du gal te tha dad par mi snang yang rdul phra rab kyang rang gi rnam pa 'jog par nus pa'i phyir 'dir gang gi skyon du 'gyur /üîΩde lta na 'o na dngos po nyid snang @84a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te tha dad par mi snang yang rdul phra rab kyang rang gi rnam pa 'jog par nus pa'i phyir 'dir gang gi skyon du 'gyur / de lta na 'o na dngos po nyid snang @84a * //
translated: Likewise, even if it does not appear as different, since a subtle particle can posit its own aspect, what is the fault here?

original: ba las 'das pa mngon sum yin zhing /
analyzed: ba las 'das pa mngon sum yin zhing /
translated: If that is so, then a thing itself would be a direct perception that transcends appearance.

original: gzhan yang phyin ci log gi rnam pa snang ba mngon sum rtog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyin ci log gi rnam pa snang ba mngon sum rtog par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, an appearance of a mistaken aspect would be a direct perception,

original: spyi'i blo bzhin no //
analyzed: spyi'i blo bzhin no //
translated: like a cognition of a generality.

original: 'on te shes pa'i rnam pa nyid shin tu mthug po bar med par mngon du byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa'i rnam pa nyid shin tu mthug po bar med par mngon du byed pa'i phyir /
translated: If, because the aspect of consciousness itself is very thick and uninterrupted,

original: mngon sum la rnam par snang bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: mngon sum la rnam par snang bar 'gyur na /
translated: it appears as an aspect in direct perception,

original: 'o na rtog pa rgyang ring bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na rtog pa rgyang ring bar 'gyur te /
translated: then a conception would be very distant,

original: rtog pa nyid la yang rang gi snang ba nyid snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa nyid la yang rang gi snang ba nyid snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because even a conception would appear as its own appearance.

original: 'dir lan btab pa /
analyzed: 'dir lan btab pa /
translated: Here is the reply:

original: ma dag par snang ba can gyi lus can rnams phyin ci log nyid du snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma dag par snang ba can gyi lus can rnams phyin ci log nyid du snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: Embodied beings who have impure appearances would appear as mistaken.

original: de la ltos nas rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ltos nas rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di brjod pa yin no //
translated: In relation to that, it is called ‚Äúnon-conceptual.‚Äù

original: dag pa mthong ba can rnams ni snang ba'i stobs kyis dmigs pa thams cad phyin ci ma log pa yin no //
analyzed: dag pa mthong ba can rnams ni snang ba'i stobs kyis dmigs pa thams cad phyin ci ma log pa yin no //
translated: Those who see the pure see all objects without error due to the power of illumination.

original: gang yang thams cad rtog pa med pa'o zhes smras pa de la brjod pa /
analyzed: gang yang thams cad rtog pa med pa'o zhes smras pa de la brjod pa /
translated: Now, in response to the statement that all is non-conceptual, it is said:

original: rtog pa dang bcas par shes pa thams cad 'dod pa nyid de /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas par shes pa thams cad 'dod pa nyid de /
translated: All consciousnesses are accepted as conceptual,

original: rang gi rnam pa nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because their own aspects appear.

original: gzhan gyi lugs la brten nas rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rtog pa med pa'i bye brag bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs la brten nas rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rtog pa med pa'i bye brag bstan pa yin te /
translated: The distinction between conceptual and non-conceptual is taught in dependence on the other system.

original: phyi rol gyi tshul la phyi rol mngon sum du byed pa mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi tshul la phyi rol mngon sum du byed pa mngon sum yin te /
translated: In the external system, direct perception is external perception.

original: rjes su dran pa'i rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa'i rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: Conceptual memory is conceptual.

original: de mngon sum la yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i shes par brjod do //
analyzed: de mngon sum la yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i shes par brjod do //
translated: Since it does not exist in direct perception, it is called non-conceptual consciousness.

original: 'o na rdul phra rab de nyid phan tshun ltos pa med pa nyid du rnam par shes pa ci ste mi skyed ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rdul phra rab de nyid phan tshun ltos pa med pa nyid du rnam par shes pa ci ste mi skyed ce na /
translated: But why doesn‚Äôt consciousness arise without mutual dependence on those subtle particles?

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: rdul phran gzhan dag med par ni //
analyzed: rdul phran gzhan dag med par ni //
translated: Without other subtle particles,

original: rdul phran khyad par de yang med //
analyzed: rdul phran khyad par de yang med //
translated: that difference of the subtle particle does not exist.

original: de gcig nges med phyir shes pa //üîΩspyi yi spyod yul can du bshad //
analyzed: de gcig nges med phyir shes pa // spyi yi spyod yul can du bshad //
translated: Since that one is not ascertained,

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: it is explained as having a general object.

original: rdul phra rab rnams kyi rnam par shes pa la rnam pa gtod par nus pa'i khyad par de ni /
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams kyi rnam par shes pa la rnam pa gtod par nus pa'i khyad par de ni /
translated: Here, that difference of the subtle particle that is able to cast an aspect to the consciousness of the subtle particles

original: rdul phra mo gzhan dag med par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra mo gzhan dag med par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: does not exist without other subtle particles.

original: rdul phra rab de dag gi tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin na /üîΩji ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par skye bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rdul phra rab de dag gi tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa yin na / ji ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par skye bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: If it depends on the collection of those subtle particles,üîΩhow could it arise without mutual dependence?

original: gang gis na phan tshun ltos pa med par snang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na phan tshun ltos pa med par snang bar 'gyur /
translated: By what means would it appear without mutual dependence?

original: de ste de'i phyir rdul phra rab gcig la nges pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ste de'i phyir rdul phra rab gcig la nges pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since that one subtle particle is not ascertained,

original: shes pa spyi'i spyod yul can du bstan bcos mdzad pas bshad do //
analyzed: shes pa spyi'i spyod yul can du bstan bcos mdzad pas bshad do //
translated: Because the treatise was composed for the sake of the domain of cognition in general.

original: de dag gis ni /
analyzed: de dag gis ni /
translated: These linesüîΩindicate the meaning of the following lines from the autocommentary:

original: der ni du ma'i don skyed phyir //
analyzed: der ni du ma'i don skyed phyir //
translated: Because it produces the meaning of many,

original: rang gi yul la spyi'i yul can //üîΩzhes bya ba'i don bstan par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rang gi yul la spyi'i yul can // zhes bya ba'i don bstan par 'gyur ro /
translated: it is a domain of generality with regard to its object.

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi @84b 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi @84b 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu pa /
translated: Tenth chapter

original: tsi ste skye mched gcig nyid la'ang //
analyzed: tsi ste skye mched gcig nyid la'ang //
translated: Even with regard to a single sense base,

original: cig car du ma mi snang na //
analyzed: cig car du ma mi snang na //
translated: many things do not appear simultaneously.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: With regard to this,

original: de lta mod kyi rdul phra rab rnams skye mched gcig pa can yin yang /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi rdul phra rab rnams skye mched gcig pa can yin yang /
translated: although the atoms have a single sense base,

original: rdul phra rab du ma'i 'khor lo cig car mi snang ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab du ma'i 'khor lo cig car mi snang ba de'i phyir /
translated: the circle of many atoms does not appear simultaneously.

original: sngar mthong ba nyid kyi don dang mtshams sbyor ba las /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba nyid kyi don dang mtshams sbyor ba las /
translated: Therefore, because it connects with the object that was previously seen,

original: rdul phra rab rnam pa 'dzin pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnam pa 'dzin pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: the apprehension of atoms is conceptual.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa'i rdul phra rab mthong bas bslangs pa'i don dang mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa'i rdul phra rab mthong bas bslangs pa'i don dang mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: This is because it connects with the object that was elicited by the perception of mutually distinct atoms.

original: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that direct perception is free from conceptual thought.

original: gcig mthong ba na du ma cig car yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig mthong ba na du ma cig car yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And when one sees one thing, one does not simultaneously determine many things.

original: yid gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir gang la byed pa yod pa de nyid shes par nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yid gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir gang la byed pa yod pa de nyid shes par nus pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the mind is one, that which has an operation is able to know.

original: rdul phra mo du ma cig car yongs su gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra mo du ma cig car yongs su gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But many atoms are not simultaneously determined.

original: de'i phyir yan lag can gyi rdzas khas blang bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag can gyi rdzas khas blang bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, one must accept a substance that has parts.

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩtil sogs tha dad rnams la ni//
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / til sogs tha dad rnams la ni//
translated: Here we say:üîΩWhy do different things such as sesame seeds

original: ci'i phyir cig car 'dzin par snang //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir cig car 'dzin par snang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: appear to be grasped simultaneously?

original: gal te rdul phra rab rnams cig car mi snang ba de'i tshe sngon gyi rdul phra rab bsres nas rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te rdul phra rab rnams cig car mi snang ba de'i tshe sngon gyi rdul phra rab bsres nas rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur la /
translated: If subtle atoms do not appear simultaneously, then the previous subtle atoms would be mixed and there would be conceptual thought.

original: de yang ma 'dres pa'i rdul phra mo mngon sum du byas pas rtog pa med par grub ste /
analyzed: de yang ma 'dres pa'i rdul phra mo mngon sum du byas pas rtog pa med par grub ste /
translated: But that is established without conceptual thought because unmixed subtle atoms are perceived.

original: sngar gyi rdul phra rab bsre ba ni shes pa gzhan kho na yin no //
analyzed: sngar gyi rdul phra rab bsre ba ni shes pa gzhan kho na yin no //
translated: The mixing of previous subtle atoms is just another cognition.

original: gzhan yang gal te cig car don du ma yongs su gcod par mi 'gyur ba de lta na ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te cig car don du ma yongs su gcod par mi 'gyur ba de lta na ni /
translated: Moreover, if it is not the case that many objects are discerned simultaneously,

original: nges pa'i sa phyogs su til dang sran ma sha dang mon sran gre'u la sogs pa phan tshun ldan pa ma yin pa rnams cig car 'dzin par snang bar ci'i phyir 'gyur /
analyzed: nges pa'i sa phyogs su til dang sran ma sha dang mon sran gre'u la sogs pa phan tshun ldan pa ma yin pa rnams cig car 'dzin par snang bar ci'i phyir 'gyur /
translated: then why is it that in a definite place, such as sesame seeds, beans, meat, and peas, which are not mutually conjoined, appear to be apprehended simultaneously?

original: 'on te shes pa shin tu myur bar 'jug pas tha dad pa'i til rnams la cig car snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa shin tu myur bar 'jug pas tha dad pa'i til rnams la cig car snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that because consciousness operates very quickly, the different sesame seeds appear simultaneously,

original: smras pa / 'dir ni mgyogs pa'i lan btab zin //
analyzed: smras pa / 'dir ni mgyogs pa'i lan btab zin //
translated: we reply: Here we have already given the answer to the quick reply.

original: de rnams rim gyis 'byung ba na //
analyzed: de rnams rim gyis 'byung ba na //
translated: If they arise in sequence,

original: rim min 'dzin pa cis ma yin //
analyzed: rim min 'dzin pa cis ma yin //
translated: why is their apprehension not sequential?

original: dus mtshungs can blo thams cad ni //
analyzed: dus mtshungs can blo thams cad ni //
translated: All cognitions that are simultaneousüîΩwith the sense faculties are not

original: de las rim min snang can 'ga' ;
analyzed: de las rim min snang can 'ga' ;
translated: sequential in their appearance.

original: / ci phyir gzhan ni rim ldan yin //
analyzed: / ci phyir gzhan ni rim ldan yin //
translated: Why are the others sequential?

original: de phyir don kun 'dzin pa la //üîΩ'di ni rim min thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de phyir don kun 'dzin pa la // 'di ni rim min thal bar 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, in the apprehension of all objects,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: this would entail a nonsequential appearance.

original: cig car 'dzin pa 'dir rgyu mtshan mgyogs pa'i lan ni yi ge dus gcig thos par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis lan btab zin to //
analyzed: cig car 'dzin pa 'dir rgyu mtshan mgyogs pa'i lan ni yi ge dus gcig thos par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis lan btab zin to //
translated: The reason for simultaneous apprehension has already been answered by the statement ‚Äúthe letters are heard simultaneously.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang @85a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang @85a * //
translated: Moreover,

original: mgyogs pas cig car ma yin par snang ba la cig car snang ba de ltar shes ta /
analyzed: mgyogs pas cig car ma yin par snang ba la cig car snang ba de ltar shes ta /
translated: if it is not simultaneous because of speed, then it is known to appear simultaneously.

original: dper na autpala'i 'dab ma brgya 'bigs pa mgyogs pas cig car snang bar mthong ba de bzhin du gzhan du yang yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: dper na autpala'i 'dab ma brgya 'bigs pa mgyogs pas cig car snang bar mthong ba de bzhin du gzhan du yang yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rung ste /
translated: For example, it is not possible to say that the appearance of the piercing of a hundred lotus petals is simultaneous because of speed, and the same is true in other cases.

original: dpe tsam gyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: dpe tsam gyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because the probandum is not established by mere example.

original: / gzhan yang 'dab ma brgya 'bigs pa steng 'og na gnas pa'i don ni cig car 'bigs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / gzhan yang 'dab ma brgya 'bigs pa steng 'og na gnas pa'i don ni cig car 'bigs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the piercing of a hundred petals is not simultaneously pierced,

original: rim pa rjes su dpag pas grub pa yin no //üîΩtil rnams la ni cig car mthong ba la gnod pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rim pa rjes su dpag pas grub pa yin no // til rnams la ni cig car mthong ba la gnod pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: and it is established by inference in sequence.üîΩIn the case of sesame seeds, there is no contradiction in seeing them simultaneously,

original: gnod pa med par yang cig car snang ba phyin ci log tu grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa med par yang cig car snang ba phyin ci log tu grub pa ma yin no //
translated: and without contradiction, simultaneous appearance is not established as erroneous.

original: gzhan yang til de dag nyid rim gyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can la ni mgyogs par snang ba rim pa ma yin par 'dzin pa ci'i phyir ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang til de dag nyid rim gyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can la ni mgyogs par snang ba rim pa ma yin par 'dzin pa ci'i phyir ma yin //
translated: Moreover, why would the mode of appearance of those sesame seeds that arise in sequence not be apprehended in sequence?

original: gzhan yang skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid can gyi dus mtshungs pa gang la yod pa'i blo de lta bu'i blo thams cad 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid can gyi dus mtshungs pa gang la yod pa'i blo de lta bu'i blo thams cad 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, all minds that have the characteristic of a moment of time that is the same would be minds that are transformed.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are not momentary.

original: blo rnams la dus tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: blo rnams la dus tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The minds do not have different times.

original: de'i phyir blo de dag gi nang nas blo 'ga' zhig til la sogs pa rnams rim pa dang ldan pa la rim pa med par snang ba can yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir blo de dag gi nang nas blo 'ga' zhig til la sogs pa rnams rim pa dang ldan pa la rim pa med par snang ba can yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, among those minds, some minds would perceive sesame seeds and so on that have sequence as being without sequence.

original: blo gzhan dag til la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ba gang yin pa de rnams rim gyis snang ba can du ci'i phyir 'gyur te /
analyzed: blo gzhan dag til la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ba gang yin pa de rnams rim gyis snang ba can du ci'i phyir 'gyur te /
translated: Why would other minds that perceive sesame seeds and so on that arise in sequence not perceive them as arising in sequence?

original: dngos po mthong ba ni blo'i tshad tsam gyis dus can yin zhing /
analyzed: dngos po mthong ba ni blo'i tshad tsam gyis dus can yin zhing /
translated: The perception of things is characterized by time, which is the measure of the mind.

original: blo de dag kyang dus mtshungs pa can yin no //
analyzed: blo de dag kyang dus mtshungs pa can yin no //
translated: And those minds are the same in terms of time.

original: de'i phyir don thams cad 'dzin pa na snang ba 'di la rim pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir don thams cad 'dzin pa na snang ba 'di la rim pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when all the objects are apprehended, it follows that they would be seen all at once.

original: de bas na cig car mthong ba ni mgyogs pas byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na cig car mthong ba ni mgyogs pas byas pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the appearance of something seen all at once is not due to speed.

original: gzhan yang cig car mthong ba nyams su myong ba ni gsal bar snang ba can yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang cig car mthong ba nyams su myong ba ni gsal bar snang ba can yin no //
translated: Moreover, the experience of seeing something all at once is the appearance of something clear.

original: gal te yang mgyogs pa las /
analyzed: gal te yang mgyogs pa las /
translated: If, on the other hand, you imagine that you see something all at once because of speed,

original: sngar mthong ba las sgro btags nas rim pa med par rtogs na ni /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba las sgro btags nas rim pa med par rtogs na ni /
translated: then you would not understand the sequence of seeing something earlier and something later.

original: ji ltar shin tu gsal ba yongs su gcod pa can gcod pa can cig car snang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar shin tu gsal ba yongs su gcod pa can gcod pa can cig car snang bar 'gyur /
translated: How could there be the appearance of something very clear and distinct all at once?

original: de'i phyir cig car mthong ba shin tu gsal ba'i lus can rtog pa med par bden par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir cig car mthong ba shin tu gsal ba'i lus can rtog pa med par bden par grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the experience of seeing something all at once is established as true without any conceptualization.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / phye leb khra bo la sogs gzugs //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phye leb khra bo la sogs gzugs //
translated: Even though the variegated form of a butterfly, etc.

original: gcig min na yang mthong ba ci //
analyzed: gcig min na yang mthong ba ci //
translated: is not one, why is it seen?

original: gal te khra bo de gcig na //
analyzed: gal te khra bo de gcig na //
translated: If the variegated is one,

original: de las 'di ches ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: de las 'di ches ngo mtshar che //
translated: this is even more amazing.

original: sna tshogs yin phyir gcig pa min //
analyzed: sna tshogs yin phyir gcig pa min //
translated: It is not one because it is variegated.

original: dper na nor @85b bu'i gzugs bzhin no //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na nor @85b bu'i gzugs bzhin no // zhes bya ba la /
translated: For example, it is like the form of a reflection.

original: gal te gzugs kyi skye mched du gzung ba rdul phra mo du ma 'dzin pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs kyi skye mched du gzung ba rdul phra mo du ma 'dzin pa ma yin na /
translated: If the form base that is apprehended is not the apprehension of many subtle particles,

original: de lta ba ni phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'i gzugs gcig ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ba ni phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'i gzugs gcig ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then, because the form of a multicolored object, such as a butterfly wing, is not a single thing,

original: cig car snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cig car snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not appear simultaneously.

original: 'on te phye ma leb khra bo'i gzugs gang yin pa sna tshogs yan lag can gcig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te phye ma leb khra bo'i gzugs gang yin pa sna tshogs yan lag can gcig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the form of a multicolored object, such as a butterfly wing, is a single thing that has various parts,

original: 'di khas len na phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'i khra bo las ches ngo mtshar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di khas len na phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'i khra bo las ches ngo mtshar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then if you accept that, it would be more amazing than a multicolored butterfly wing.

original: de'i phyir sna tshogs par gyur na gcig pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sna tshogs par gyur na gcig pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, if it is various, it cannot be a single nature.

original: 'di lta khra bo zhes bya ba ni phan tshun tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi dngos po ni gzhan du rjod par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di lta khra bo zhes bya ba ni phan tshun tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi dngos po ni gzhan du rjod par byed pa yin na /
translated: In this way, that which is called ‚Äúmulticolored‚Äù is an entity that has mutually different aspects, and it is described as ‚Äúother.‚Äù

original: ji ltar gcig du mar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar gcig du mar 'gyur /
translated: How could it be one and many?

original: de bas na phye ma leb khra bo sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can ni gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na phye ma leb khra bo sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can ni gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, a variegated butterfly is not a unity,

original: dper na nor bu mar gad dang padma r'a ga dang / mu tig la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs tha dad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nor bu mar gad dang padma r'a ga dang / mu tig la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs tha dad pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the forms of different jewels, such as lapis lazuli, ruby, pearl, etc., are not.

original: 'on te nor bu rnams tha dad pa ni rdzas tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te nor bu rnams tha dad pa ni rdzas tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: But the jewels are different because they are different substances.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can nyid yin gyi /
translated: They have a variegated form.

original: phye ma leb khra bo la ni rdzas tha dad par snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la ni rdzas tha dad par snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But in the case of a variegated butterfly, there is no appearance of different substances.

original: phye ma leb khra bo la yang phan tshun tha dad par snang ba bzlog par mi nus par 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la yang phan tshun tha dad par snang ba bzlog par mi nus par 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that the appearance of difference in a variegated butterfly cannot be denied?

original: tha dad par yongs su gcod pa nyid tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad par yongs su gcod pa nyid tha dad pa ste /
translated: The determination of difference is difference.

original: de'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa gcig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa gcig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, a variegated butterfly, etc., is not a unity.

original: 'on te nor bu rnams la sngon po la sogs pa cha tha dad par snang ba yod de /
analyzed: 'on te nor bu rnams la sngon po la sogs pa cha tha dad par snang ba yod de /
translated: But in the case of jewels, the appearance of different parts, such as blue, etc.,

original: 'di ltar aindra n'i la sngon po'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang padma r'a ga ni dmar po'i gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / reg bya'i bye brag kyang nor bu la dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar aindra n'i la sngon po'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang padma r'a ga ni dmar po'i gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / reg bya'i bye brag kyang nor bu la dmigs pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the blue form is apprehended by sapphire and the red form is apprehended by ruby, and the specific tactile objects are observed in jewels.

original: phye ma leb khra bo la ni gzugs tha dad par snang ba med cing /
analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la ni gzugs tha dad par snang ba med cing /
translated: But in a multicolored butterfly, the different forms do not appear,

original: reg bya tha dad par snang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: reg bya tha dad par snang ba yang ma yin te /
translated: and the different tactile objects do not appear.

original: de'i phyir gcig pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, they are the same.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: ras khra bo sogs sdo sogs //üîΩrnam pa ha dad mtshungs pa yin //
analyzed: ras khra bo sogs sdo sogs // rnam pa ha dad mtshungs pa yin //
translated: A multicolored cloth and so on

original: zhes bya ba la /üîΩsngon po dang ljang gu la sogs pa rnams dang rig pa'i cha tha dad pa gang yin pa mar gad la sogs pa tha dad pa'i rgyur brjod pa de ni phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / sngon po dang ljang gu la sogs pa rnams dang rig pa'i cha tha dad pa gang yin pa mar gad la sogs pa tha dad pa'i rgyur brjod pa de ni phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la mtshungs pa ste /
translated: are similar in having different aspects.üîΩHere, the different aspects of blue, green, and so on are said to be the cause of the different aspects of sapphire and so on. That is similar in a multicolored butterfly and so on.

analyzed: 'di ltar phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la sngon po la sogs pa'i cha tha dad pa 'di sngon po yin zhing /
translated: Thus, in a multicolored butterfly and so on, the different aspects of blue and so on are blue,

original: 'di ni ser po'i rang bzhin no snyam pa mthong ba kho na @86a * //
analyzed: 'di ni ser po'i rang bzhin no snyam pa mthong ba kho na @86a * //
translated: The thought This is the nature of yellow is the perception of yellow alone.

analyzed: yin la ; de la reg bya ni phan 'dogs pas tha dad pa yin no //
translated: The tactile sensation is different because it is helpful.

analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar nor bu la cha shas med par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, how can the gem be partless?

analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la ni cha tha dad pa yod par 'gyur ba yin /

original: reg bya'i bye brag kyang ma nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: reg bya'i bye brag kyang ma nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: The difference in tactile sensations is also not certain.

analyzed: 'di ltar rigs mi mthun pa'i snal ma las byas pa'i phye ma leb khra bo kha reg bya mtshungs pa ma yin no //

original: de la yan lag can yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yan lag can yod pa ni ma yin te /

analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i rdzas rtsom pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no composition of substances of different types.

original: gal te de la yan lag gzugs //
analyzed: gal te de la yan lag gzugs //
translated: If only the part that is form

analyzed: 'ba' zhig de ltar snang gyur na // 'di ltar sdo sogs bsal nas ni //
translated: appears in that way,üîΩthen it is amazing that

analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they have a variegated aspect,

original: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul can te /
analyzed: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul can te /
translated: entities such as jewels, pearls, coral, and so on have a variegated mode.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid can du 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te blo sna tshogs pa'i tshul can /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid can du 'gyur ro // gal te blo sna tshogs pa'i tshul can /
translated: They have a variegated aspect.

original: phye ma leb khra bo la sna tshogs pa nyid du grub pa'i rgyu ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la sna tshogs pa nyid du grub pa'i rgyu ma yin pa ste /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThe variegated mode of cognitions is not the cause of the establishment of variegation in a multicolored butterfly;

original: sgrub byed ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub byed ma yin no zhe na /
translated: it is not the proof,‚Äù

original: 'o na tshad ma gang gis mu tig dang / padma r'a ga la sogs pa tha dad par grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na tshad ma gang gis mu tig dang / padma r'a ga la sogs pa tha dad par grub par 'gyur /
translated: Well then, by what valid cognition is the difference between pearl, ruby, etc. established?

original: de bas na tha dad pa'i tha snyad thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na tha dad pa'i tha snyad thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, all conventions of difference would be lost.

original: ras khra bo gcig pa nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: ras khra bo gcig pa nyid ma yin la /
translated: A variegated cloth is not a unity.

original: 'on kyang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru la sogs pa rim gyis nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin yang /
analyzed: 'on kyang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru la sogs pa rim gyis nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin yang /
translated: However, one experiences a jewel, pearl, coral, etc. in sequence,

original: shin tu myur bar snang bas cig car snang ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: shin tu myur bar snang bas cig car snang ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: but because they appear very quickly, they appear as if simultaneous.

original: de lta na ni don thams cad dmigs pa rnams ni phyin ci log tu 'dzin par dogs kyi /
analyzed: de lta na ni don thams cad dmigs pa rnams ni phyin ci log tu 'dzin par dogs kyi /
translated: If that is so, then all objects that are observed are apprehended as mistaken,

original: gang du yang de kho na nyid nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du yang de kho na nyid nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and nowhere is reality ascertained.

original: des na thams cad 'thad pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na thams cad 'thad pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, everything would be untenable.

original: de'i phyir nor bu cig car rtogs pa rnams ni rjes su dpag pas rim pa rtogs par mi rung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir nor bu cig car rtogs pa rnams ni rjes su dpag pas rim pa rtogs par mi rung ste /
translated: Thus, the realization of a jewel, etc. simultaneously is not suitable to be realized sequentially by inference,

original: mngon sum gyis cig car nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis cig car nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is experienced simultaneously by direct perception.

original: 'on te mngon sum nyid kyang cig car snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum nyid kyang cig car snang ba ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that direct perception also does not appear all at once,

original: rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: then it is contradicted by inference.

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa nyid du de mi 'gyur te /üîΩcig car @87a * //
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa nyid du de mi 'gyur te / cig car @87a * //
translated: But then that is not an inference,

original: mngon pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradicted by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir thal ba mtshungs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir thal ba mtshungs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: So the reductio is equivalent.

original: 'on te mthong ba ni ci zhig ltar mig gi nyes pa las 'byung gi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te mthong ba ni ci zhig ltar mig gi nyes pa las 'byung gi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But if you say that what is seen arises from a fault of the eye, not from inference,

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas nye bar gzhag pa'i rim par snang ba du ma la yod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas nye bar gzhag pa'i rim par snang ba du ma la yod kyi /
translated: then it is not the case that many things appear in the order in which they are posited by inference.

original: mngon sum cig car snang ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum cig car snang ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But direct perception does not appear all at once.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: rab rib kyis bslad pa'i mig yul la phyin ci log tu snang ba skyed par rigs kyi /
analyzed: rab rib kyis bslad pa'i mig yul la phyin ci log tu snang ba skyed par rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable that the eye, affected by cataracts, generates a distorted appearance of an object,

original: rim pas mthong ba ni rgyu'i skyon gyis rim pa med par 'gyur bar dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rim pas mthong ba ni rgyu'i skyon gyis rim pa med par 'gyur bar dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: but it is not observed that what is seen gradually becomes nonsequential due to a fault of the cause.

original: ngo bo nyid gcig ni gzhan pa'i rnam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gcig ni gzhan pa'i rnam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The nature of a single entity is not of the nature of another.

original: cig car snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cig car snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would appear simultaneously.

original: 'on te rim par snang ba'i nor bu rnams la cig car snang ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rim par snang ba'i nor bu rnams la cig car snang ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that the cognition of simultaneous appearance in jewels that appear successively is mistaken,

original: 'o na 'khrul pa nyid ci zhig yin te /
analyzed: 'o na 'khrul pa nyid ci zhig yin te /
translated: then what is the error?

original: ci snang ba med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci snang ba med pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that there is no appearance?

original: 'on te rnam pa gzhan pa yin grang na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa gzhan pa yin grang na /
translated: Or is it that there is another aspect?

original: gal te rim pa dang ldan par mi snang ba rim par snang ba la 'khrul pa nyid yin na ;
analyzed: gal te rim pa dang ldan par mi snang ba rim par snang ba la 'khrul pa nyid yin na ;
translated: If it is the error of appearing successively when it does not appear successively,

original: 'o na ni sngon po la yang ser por mi snang ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni sngon po la yang ser por mi snang ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then blue would be an error because it does not appear as yellow.

original: gal te yang rim pa med par mi snang ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang rim pa med par mi snang ba yin na /
translated: If it is the error of not appearing without succession,

original: 'o na rim pa nyid shin tu gsal bar snang ba'i lus can snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na rim pa nyid shin tu gsal bar snang ba'i lus can snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: then since succession itself would appear very clearly,

original: ji ltar 'khrul par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar 'khrul par 'gyur /
translated: how could it be an error?

original: sngon por snang ba nyid de 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon por snang ba nyid de 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: The appearance as blue is not an error.

original: 'on te rim pa dang ldan par snang ba la cig car snang ba 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /üîΩde lta mod kyi rim par snang ba can nyid dang / rim pa mi snang ba can gyi rim pa med pa la rim pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te rim pa dang ldan par snang ba la cig car snang ba 'khrul pa yin no zhe na / de lta mod kyi rim par snang ba can nyid dang / rim pa mi snang ba can gyi rim pa med pa la rim pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But if it is the appearance of a succession that is mistaken for a simultaneous appearance,

original: de'i phyir blo de rim pa dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir blo de rim pa dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: then, since the one that has the appearance of a succession is not without a succession, how could that cognition have a succession?

original: de bas na gang cig car myong bar gyur pa de cig car snang ba can yin te /
analyzed: de bas na gang cig car myong bar gyur pa de cig car snang ba can yin te /
translated: Therefore, whatever is experienced simultaneously has a simultaneous appearance,

original: snang ba nyid rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba nyid rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cause of the determination of appearance is just that.

original: 'o na ri mo la sogs pa la khra bo'i blo cig car snang bar 'gyur ba de bas na rtsig pa'i logs la khra bo gcig pa nyid du rigs kyi /
analyzed: 'o na ri mo la sogs pa la khra bo'i blo cig car snang bar 'gyur ba de bas na rtsig pa'i logs la khra bo gcig pa nyid du rigs kyi /
translated: But if the cognition of a variegated object such as a painting appears simultaneously, then the variegated object on the wall is reasonable as a single entity,

original: mar gad dang padma r'a ga la sogs pa la ni khra bo'i blo gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mar gad dang padma r'a ga la sogs pa la ni khra bo'i blo gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: but the cognition of a variegated object such as a crystal is not a single entity.

original: de'i phyir blo nyid snang ba'i cha tha dad pa'i phyir khra bo gcig yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir blo nyid snang ba'i cha tha dad pa'i phyir khra bo gcig yin la /
translated: Therefore, because the cognition itself has a different aspect of appearance, it is a single variegated entity.

original: nor bu la sogs pa ni gcig pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nor bu la sogs pa ni gcig pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But a gem, etc. is not one!

original: 'dir smras pa //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa //
translated: Here we reply:

original: rigs mi mthun rnams rtsom med phyir //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun rnams rtsom med phyir //
translated: Because of the non-commencement of dissimilar types,

original: ri mo sogs gzugs sna tshogs min //
analyzed: ri mo sogs gzugs sna tshogs min //
translated: The variegated color, etc. is not a variety.

original: ldan pa khra min gzugs med phyir //
analyzed: ldan pa khra min gzugs med phyir //
translated: Because of the non-existence of a variegated color, etc.

original: btags pa tsam la brten min te //
analyzed: btags pa tsam la brten min te //
translated: It is not based on mere designation,

original: re re khra @87b bo min phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: re re khra @87b bo min phyir ro // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because each is not variegated.

original: ri mo la sogs pa la khra bo'i blo gcig ni khra bo gcig gis 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ri mo la sogs pa la khra bo'i blo gcig ni khra bo gcig gis 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the cognition of the variegated in a painting, etc. is not the apprehension of a single variegated [entity],

original: de la yan lag can med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yan lag can med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no whole there.

original: rdzas med pa ni ser po dang ljang gu la sogs pa'i rigs mi mthun pa'i cha shas rnams kyis rdzas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas med pa ni ser po dang ljang gu la sogs pa'i rigs mi mthun pa'i cha shas rnams kyis rdzas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a non-substance does not commence a substance with parts of dissimilar types, such as yellow, green, etc.

original: 'di ltar rigs mi mthun pa'i snal ma'i tshogs kyis snam bu mi rtsom pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs mi mthun pa'i snal ma'i tshogs kyis snam bu mi rtsom pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because a cloth is not commenced by a collection of dissimilar threads,

original: snam bu'i rdzas khra bo ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snam bu'i rdzas khra bo ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the substance of a variegated cloth does not exist.

original: 'on te ri mo la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa'i yan lag gis bskyed pa'i ldan pa khra bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te ri mo la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa'i yan lag gis bskyed pa'i ldan pa khra bor 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, it is variegated because it is produced by parts of different types, such as lines and so on.

original: gal te rdzas ni rigs mi mthun pa'i rgyus bskyed pa ma yin te /
